page1.title: Mahanati
page1.description: The life story of South Indian actress Savitri, who took the film industry by storm in the late '50s and '60s.

page1.title: Abrahaminte Santhathikal
page1.description: A dedicated police officer struggles to balance his duty to his job and his family obligations when his brother is arrested for murder.

page1.title: Aadhi
page1.description: Aadhi, an aspiring musician, travels to Banglore in hopes of making it big. While there, an unexpected event leaves him trapped, unable to return to his family and running for his life.

page1.title: Aabhaasam
page1.description: The story of Aabhaasam is about an overnight bus journey from Bangalore to Kerala where the travelers analyze the schizophrenic society and how it has evolved through different times.

page1.title: Ee Ma Yau
page1.description: The sudden death of a man throws a family into turmoil as they frantically scramble to plan his funeral.

page1.title: Aravindante Athidhikal
page1.description: A lodge owner raises a boy he finds in an old temple.

page2.title: Panchavarnathatha
page2.description: A bird charmer influences the lives of people.

page2.title: Kuttanpillayude Sivarathri
page2.description: Kuttanpillai loves a jackfruit tree in his compound more than anything around him. His daughters and relatives visit him once for Sivarathri and the occasion turns out to be like no other.

page2.title: Njan Marykutty
page2.description: A transgender woman challenges social norms.

page2.title: Mohanlal
page2.description: A woman is born on the same day Mohanlal's first movie premieres.

page2.title: Koode
page2.description: A family tragedy causes a young man to reflect on his childhood and reassess his future. A remake of the 2014 Marathi film Happy Journey.

page2.title: Ranam
page2.description: In Detroit's bleak neighborhoods, the gangs depend on a code of silence. Trapped in a life of crime, a mysterious getaway driver lives with this code of conduct and protects his only friend. An action-crime-drama!!

page3.title: Swathanthryam Ardharathriyil
page3.description: A manager at a big financial firm is sent to jail after he tries to help the woman he loves escape a criminal charge. The only way he can make it is to find a way to break out of prison.

page3.title: Eeda
page3.description: A modern take on William Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet, set in the backdrops of political violence in Kannur, North Malabar.

page3.title: Neerali
page3.description: A man's life hangs in the balance after an accident. A drama- thriller!!

page3.title: Sudani From Nigeria
page3.description: The story follows a Nigerian football player who joins a club in Malappuram, Kerala for the sevens football match. A comedy blockbuster!!

page3.title: Kamuki
page3.description: Based on a true story, Kamuki is all about being blind in love and loving a visually challenged boy.

page3.title: Ok Kanmani
page3.description: Two young lovers are compatible in every way - they even agree that marriage is futile. However, their emotions are not so easily managed, especially when they witness the unconditional love of the older couple with whom they live.(Malayalam Dubbed)

page4.title: B. Tech
page4.description: Students are put to the test as their lives get murkier.

page4.title: Uncle
page4.description: A family faces an unusual situation.

page4.title: Kaala
page4.description: Kaala who runs away from Tirunelveli in his childhood, moves to Mumbai where he becomes a powerful don living in the slums of Dharavi. (Malayalam Dubbed)

page4.title: Mayaanadhi
page4.description: A mule driver in a gang and an aspiring actress try to navigate their way through an unexpected romance.

page4.title: Three Kings
page4.description: Ram, Bhasi, and Sankar belong to a royal family but their palace is soon to be auctioned off due to heavy debts. The three meet an ailing prisoner who tells them about a treasure inside a jungle which is worth millions. A spoof caper film!!

page4.title: Swapnakoodu
page4.description: The story is about three final year students at the Pondicherry Institute of Hotel Management and Catering in search of their identities and their encounters with two sisters. A super hit rom-com!!

page5.title: Little Superman
page5.description: A 12-year-old comic book fan discovers he has telekinesis and the power to fly.

page5.title: Goal
page5.description: A young footballer wins hearts by doing what he does best - playing the beautiful game. Goal is a 2007 Malayalam film directed by Kamal.

page5.title: Samarpanam
page5.description: When a young girl is killed in a suspicious train accident, three very different people band together in their mutual quest for answers.

page5.title: Velipadinte Pusthakam
page5.description: A professor tries to reform the atmosphere of a college by developing a healthy relationship between teachers and students. 2017 Viral Hit song "Entammede Jimikki Kammal" is featured in this movie.

page5.title: Parava
page5.description: The story of Parava revolves around pigeon race, a game, which is prominent in Mattancherry, Kochi, Kerala. A super hit movie about friendship!!

page5.title: Chanakyathantram
page5.description: Despite being the topper in Criminology, Arjun aspires to be a private detective. As he pursues his passion with full vigor, he realizes that he is trapped by a mesh of situations. Will he be able to tackle it?

page6.title: Kuttanandan Marpappa
page6.description: John Paul is a rather naive photographer from Karuvatta, Alapuzha. Unlucky in love, John gets attracted to Jessi, the daughter of Panchayat President Oomachan. Will John be fortunate in love this time? A comedy entertainer!!

page6.title: Sukhamano Daveede
page6.description: Sughamano Daveede is a Malayalam movie starring Bhagath Manuel, Chethan Jayalal and Priyanka Nair in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Anup Chandran and Raja Mohan.

page6.title: Parole
page6.description: A prisoner, who is much loved by his inmates and police officers, gets parole after spending eight years in jail. Based on a true story!!

page6.title: Daivame Kaithozham K. Kumar Akanam
page6.description: The film revolves around how the lives of K. Krishna Kumar (Jayaram) and his wife Nirmala (Anusree) go for a toss after lord almighty enters their house. A comedy entertainer!!

page6.title: Ankarajyathe Jimmanmar
page6.description: Prakashan wishes to be a filmmaker. He leaves his wife and kid behind in the village and goes to Kochi to meet his friend Kichu, who, he believes, has earned a name for himself in the industry. A comedy movie!!

page6.title: Solo
page6.description: Solo tells the story of four different people, each story revolving around four different elements: Earth, Fire, Wind and Water, each with the different facets of Lord Shiva.A 2017 bilingual experimental anthology art film !!

page7.title: Melle
page7.description: Uma and her father Job live together in Kolkatta. He wants to return to his homeland. After an upsetting experience, Uma meets the love of her life. Together they set off to discover their new life together. A romantic family drama!!

page7.title: Paippin Chuvattile Pranayam
page7.description: Paipin Chuvattile Pranayam is the story of an island and its people - a self-contained world where goodwill and camaraderie prevail over everything else. At the centre of this world are Govutty and Teena, and their endearing love story.

page7.title: Punyalan Private Limited
page7.description: A budding entrepreneur fights social injustice in his bid to establish his new business.

page7.title: Chunkzz
page7.description: Three mechanical engineering students are overjoyed to befriend the only woman in their class. An Adult Comedy!!

page7.title: Mercury
page7.description: Five friends, all affected in some way by a mercury poisoning incident are partying when a freak accident put them on a collision course with an entity that is in no mood to forgive their misgivings. A sound film which lacks dialogues!!

page7.title: Kalyanam
page7.description: The film revolves around the life of Sarath (Sravan Mukesh), who is a love-struck youth and for whom, his childhood crush Shary (Varsha Bollamma) is the be all and end all of life.  A romantic comedy!!

page8.title: Aadu 2
page8.description: Shaji Pappan and his gang try to redeem their art club by competing in a tug of war match. It is the sequel to the 2015 film Aadu. A comedy blockbuster!!

page8.title: Overtake
page8.description: A family's struggle for survival on a road trip is the basic plot of the film. An adaptation of the Hollywood movie, Duel(1971).

page8.title: Aami
page8.description: Aami portrays the life of writer Madhavikutty(Kamala Surayya), mainly focused on her childhood, family life, devotion to Lord Krishna and conversion to Islam in the later periods of her life.

page8.title: Vimaanam
page8.description: A speech and hearing impaired man fights against enormous odds to build a lightweight aircraft from recycled materials.

page8.title: Oru Cinemakkaran
page8.description: Alby, the son of a priest is a struggling associate director and an aspiring filmmaker. A hasty and thoughtless act, driven by financial constraints, lands the young man in hot water out of the blue.

page8.title: Queen
page8.description: The story starts with the inauguration of the first-ever Mechanical batch in an engineering campus that consists of boys only. Later, a girl joins and becomes the only girl to be a part of their batch. A drama thriller!!

page9.title: Hey Jude
page9.description: Two quirky individuals fall in love, leading to a journey of self-discovery, healing and transformation.

page9.title: Cappuccino
page9.description: Richi gives his computer's hard disk for servicing in a shop and the disk gets exchanged and ends up with a girl named Sneha.However, when Richi asks for her picture, she sends him a picture of a model named Janaki, who is married to Jeevan.

page9.title: Minnaminungu
page9.description: The story of a struggling middle-aged mother portrayed by Surabhi Lakshmi for which she won the Best Actress award at the 64th National Film Awards. A critically-acclaimed family drama!!

page9.title: Bhaagamathie
page9.description: The film revolves around a woman imprisoned in a haunted house while she is interrogated by law enforcers investigating a politician they suspect of corruption.(Malayalam Dubbed Version)

page9.title: Rosapoo
page9.description: Shanu and Ambros are two youngsters who struggle to make the ends meet. Following a friends advice, they decide to try their luck in filmmaking as a last resort.  A comedy-drama!!

page10.title: Ayal Kadha Ezhuthukayanu
page10.description: It tracks the travails of wasted pulp fiction writer Sagar Kottapuram and his friend Ramakrishnan, who are dragged into a lawsuit by a vengeful Tahsildar S. Priyadarshini. A super hit black comedy movie!!

page10.title: Bhoomiyude Avakashikal
page10.description: Bhoomiyude Avakashikal is the third and last installment of T. V. Chandran's trilogy on 2002 Gujarat riots.It narrates the story of Mohanachandran Nair, who has driven away from Ahmadabad following the Gujarat riots.

page10.title: Bombay March 12
page10.description: Sameer is a sweeper by profession who is targeted by the cops due to the terror acts in the city. Things further worsen when his brother-in-law, a terror suspect, causes problems for him. A drama film based on the 1993 Bombay bomb blasts.

page10.title: Careebeyans
page10.description: The film revolves around the life of a minister and the unforeseen challenges he faces during his tenure.

page10.title: Chayilyam
page10.description: The story is about the plight of a hapless widow, who are denied the freedom to lead a normal life by the society.It won the Kerala State Film Award for Best Story 2012.

page10.title: Chicken Kokkachi
page10.description: Kallu, who hails from a middle-class family, living in a village, is forced to abscond from his village given the problems his family and he starts facing following his sister's marriage. A comedy movie!!

page11.title: City of God
page11.description: It tells the story of Tamil migrant workers and a team of land mafia criminals in the city of Kochi. A crime thriller movie that uses the hyperlink cinema format as its narrative structure.

page11.title: College Days
page11.description: The plot revolves around Ananthakrishnan, who loses his uncle, aunt, and girlfriend due to the actions of five wayward medical college students and how he seeks revenge by killing the antagonists one by one.

page11.title: Compartment
page11.description: Compartment is a docu-fiction movie which takes us into the life of two differently-abled children.

page11.title: Detective
page11.description: A detective is set the task of investigating an emerging politician's wife's death, initially ruled a suicide. A suspense thriller!!

page11.title: Aakasha Mittayee
page11.description: Akasha Mittayi is a remake of the Tamil movie 'Appa'.The movie also deals with which present-day issues of the school students in the society and other teenage problems.

page11.title: Chanakyan
page11.description: Madhava Menon, a corrupt politician, destroys the family of Johnson as he was in love with his daughter. With the help of a mimicry artist, Johnson takes revenge on Madhava Menon.A critically acclaimed and commercially successful movie!!

page12.title: Asuravithu
page12.description: Don Bosco, a young man, is studying in a Christian seminary to become a priest. However, due to some unexpected turn of events, he becomes a dreaded criminal.The film is a sequel to 2002 film Stop Violence.

page12.title: English : An Autumn in London
page12.description: The lives of five characters from diverse backgrounds whose passage to the U.K. and its aftermath are dealt with in the film.A drama with slight tinges of black humor and satire!!

page12.title: Ezham Suryan
page12.description: Chithrabhanu has taken a liking to beating up people and while trying to play savior to a young girl named Gopika ends up raping her. The girl vows vengeance and would stop at nothing until she gets to see his blood.

page12.title: Godfather
page12.description: Two people from rival clans decide to seduce each other for their family's benefit, but end up falling in love with each other. A blockbuster comedy-drama!!

page12.title: Asha Black
page12.description: The movie is based on solving the mystery of murders of five people. Sarath Kumar plays the role of investigator. A romantic thriller!!

page12.title: Goodalochana
page12.description: Four friends from Kozhikode want to make it big in their lives but are too immature to make their dreams work. One after the other, all their plans flop, but only until they make a discovery about their little group. A comedy movie!!

page13.title: Nellikka
page13.description: Balu is an engineer, who is out of a job and returns home to attend his sister's wedding. His life takes an unexpected turn when he helps a friend caught in some illegal activities.

page13.title: Aalroopangal
page13.description: Aalroopangal narrates the effects of hartal (strike action)in the life of common man. Nandu does the lead role as a roadside food vendor.The film plots how an unexpected declaration of hartal changes his life.

page13.title: Ain
page13.description: Set in a Muslim household in Malabar, the film revolves around a lazy but innocent and vulnerable youth who happens to witness a murder and escapes to Mangalore.The film won the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Malayalam 2015.

page13.title: Adaminte Makan Abu
page13.description: It tells the story of a poor perfume seller Abu whose only remaining wish in life is the Hajj pilgrimage, which he strives hard to fulfill. This was India's official entry for the Best Foreign Language Film for the Academy Awards in 2011 but was not nominated.

page13.title: 3 Wicketinu 365 Runs
page13.description: Moonnu Wicketum 365 Runsum is a Malayalam comedy movie starring Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead role.

page13.title: Zachariayude Garbhinikal
page13.description: The film narrates the incidents in the life of a gynecologist and five women who come into his life. Lal acts as the gynecologist and Asha Sharreth does the role of doctor's wife. A comedy-drama!!

page14.title: Vilakkumaram
page14.description: The story is about how some kids get labeled for life for some mistakes they commit at a young age.Bhavana plays a lovable teacher in the movie which will highlight the problems faced by the teaching fraternity.

page14.title: Vellaripravinte Changathi
page14.description: A man tries to release a stalled movie made by his father 35 years ago, and find the actors worked in it. For this movie, Dileep won the Kerala state film award for the Best Actor for the year 2011.

page14.title: Vedivazhipadu
page14.description: Vedivazhipadu depicts the events in a time frame of 24 hours on a festival in Trivandrum. An Adult Comedy!! *MATURE CONTENT*

page14.title: Kambhoji
page14.description: In a small village in Palakkad district of Kerala, Kunjunni, a Kathakali artiste and Uma Antharjanam, a Mohiniyattam dancer unite and their passion towards their art blossoms into love, but a tragedy strikes in the form of a murder. Based on a true story!!

page14.title: To Let Ambadi Talkies
page14.description: The movie is themed around few youngsters who carry dreams into the field of cinema. They also aspire to resurrect the old cinema hall which entertained villagers once. A drama-comedy movie!!

page14.title: Thiruvambadi Thamban
page14.description: A young man hails from a family that has been supplying elephants for temple processions. His father kills a cruel politician's brother without understanding his power. The son embarks on a never-ending trial to save his father.

page15.title: Tiyaan
page15.description: The lives of a Vedic scholar Pattabhiramagiri and his family come under threat after a godman and his goons try to displace him from his centuries-old ancestral home as part of building an ashram. An action-drama-thriller!!

page15.title: The Metro
page15.description: It is an anthology thriller film based on three separate incidents.The first one involves the murder of a young politician, the second story is about an I. T. Employee followed by a group of gangsters and the third story is about a group of five friends.

page15.title: Tharangam
page15.description: The movie tells about Pappan a cop along with the struggles led with his buddy Joy.  A black-comedy movie!!

page15.title: Spanish Masala
page15.description: The story set in Spain and revolves around Charlie, an illegal immigrant stranded in Madrid. To make things worse, he is conversant only in Malayalam.The film portrays the real la Tomatina festival shot for the first time in Indian cinema.

page15.title: Teja Bhai & Family
page15.description: Teja bhai, a well-known don in Malaysia, and his sidekicks are the top news of major dailies. One day, he happens to fall in love with Vedhika, a girl who happens to pass through his life. But Vedika does not know the real job of Teja.

page15.title: Oru Nunakkatha
page15.description: Aravind, Tony, and Sooraj, who are frantic cinephiles and still in college. Aravind has a crush on Aswathy, who is now playing the heroine on a new Tamil movie. The three friends, now set on a journey to the sets of the movie, to bring the girl back.

page16.title: Last Bench
page16.description: Four friends meet after a long time and walk down the memory lane of their school days.Last Bench is a 2012 Indian Malayalam drama film, directed by Jiju Asokan and produced by T.B. Raghuanthan.

page16.title: Shikhamani
page16.description: Shikhamani is an efficient railway gang-man who serves at the station which lies close to the Korangini forests. Unexpectedly, a girl named Devika, a wanted terrorist gets injured and trapped in the Korangini forest. A drama-thriller!!

page16.title: Seniors
page16.description: The plot follows four friends who return to their alma mater as students. A campus comedy movie!!

page16.title: Sarvopari Palakkaran
page16.description: A cop who is on the look-out for a suitable and conservative wife unwillingly finds himself attracted to an independent and modern woman. A comedy-drama!!

page16.title: Padmasree Bharat Dr. Saroj Kumar
page16.description: It is a spin-off of popular 2005 film Udayananu Tharam. Sreenivasan reprises the character of Superstar Saroj Kumar from the original, though not a sequel. A comedy movie!!

page16.title: Ravanaprabhu
page16.description: A hoodlum seeks revenge on the former gangster who caused him to lose an arm 30 years earlier.The film went on to become the highest-grossing Malayalam film of the year 2001.A sequel to the 1993 film Devaasuram.

page17.title: Rathinirvedam
page17.description: The film's story revolves around a teenager who falls in love with a woman older than he is. It is said to have redefined the art of movie making in South India, and hence regarded as a landmark in Indian film history. A classic coming-of-age film!!

page17.title: Pokkiri Simon
page17.description: Simon, Biju, and Ganesh are local boys who are die-hard fans of Tamil actor Thalapathy Vijay.These friends lives take a U-turn when they chance upon an unexpected event. A comedy movie!!

page17.title: Perumazhakkalam
page17.description: A man accidentally kills his friend while fighting with a man who absconded with his money and is sentenced to death. His only way out is to obtain a letter of pardon from his friend's wife. A National Film Award winner for Best Film on Other Social Issues!!

page17.title: Ee Pattanathil Bhootham
page17.description: An evil magician releases a friendly spirit to make money by committing crimes. The sorcerer loses the spirit in an accident, and it gets into the hands of children in a circus tent. A fantasy comedy movie!!

page17.title: Pandippada
page17.description: The story follows Malayali Bhuvana Chandran, an unsuccessful entrepreneur in a lot of debt, who gets involved in a land conflict between two powerful landlords in Tamil Nadu: Pandi Durai and Karuppayya Swami. A superhit comedy movie!!

page17.title: Ottakolam
page17.description: Ottakolam is the exceptional tale of a man who makes a living by cremating the dead.A Malayalam Drama movie directed by Jayan K Saaj The star casts are Santhosh Keezhattoor, Biju Babu, Hima Shankar Sheematty and others.

page18.title: One Day
page18.description: One day is a crime investigation Malayalam movie released on 11th Dec 2015. The story about a missing child. Director of the movie Sunil V panicker,  written by James bright,  produced by Mohan George, Music by Anil Bhasker.

page18.title: Note Out
page18.description: Note Out tells the story of a group of youngsters led by Nishan who lead a care-free life with neither many aspirations nor any definite goals. A smart young girl happened to come across their life which leads to so many unexpected incidents.

page18.title: Njanum Ente Familiyum
page18.description: Njanum Ente Familiyum is a 2012 Malayalam family film directed by K. K. Rajeev and starring Jayaram and Mamta Mohandas in the lead roles. The film examines the problems in a doctor family and is told in a humorous way.

page18.title: Naku Penta Naku Taka
page18.description: A humorous film about a girl Subha who dreams about marrying a person working in America, but ends up marrying a man named Vinay working in Kenya, thereby shattering her dreams. She didn't have any other choice, but to accompany her husband to Kenya.

page18.title: Mr. Perfect
page18.description: A modern-minded software expert who refuses to compromise on his values becomes engaged to a young woman who is both conservative and traditional in her ways. Malayalam Dubbed version of 2011 blockbuster Telugu Movie Mr. Perfect.

page18.title: Mayamohini
page18.description: Balakrishnan is rich but caught in a debt trap. The arrival of a woman, Mohini, changes the course of his life.Despite the innuendos, this film was the highest grossing Malayalam film of the year 2012.

page19.title: Kanmazha Peyyum Munpe
page19.description: This film narrates the life of a family when the elder boy of the family got attracted by communist ideologies, renounces religious beliefs, get involved in bloody politics and an attempted murder and was forced to go in exile.

page19.title: Karayilekku Oru Kadal Dooram
page19.description: Prone to seeing future events that turn out to be real, Anoop one day sees his own death in a trance. He decides to write one final novel before death comes visiting.Vinod Mankara won the 2010 Kerala Film Critics Award for the'Best Debutant Director'.

page19.title: Kudumbasree Travels
page19.description: It is a family-oriented comedy film, with Jayaram playing the role of Aravindan, a bus service owner who hails from a family of Chakyarkoothu artists.

page19.title: Kutteem Kolum
page19.description: The story revolves around the bonding between friends living in an imaginary village named Kumarapuram bordering Tamil Nadu. A comedy movie directed by Guinness Pakru.

page19.title: Lakshyam
page19.description: This film focusses on two people, an IT professional and a person from the slums played by Indrajith and Biju Menon respectively. The story progresses with their journey from Peermade to Eranakulam as convicts. A thriller film!!

page19.title: Makeup Man
page19.description: The tumultuous life of a couple, after the wife becomes a heroine just by chance and the husband is forced to disguise himself as her makeup man, is being told here.A similar movie to 2001 French movie My Wife Is an Actress.

page20.title: Kalyanaraman
page20.description: Kalyanaraman is a 2002 Malayalam romantic comedy film directed by Shafi starring Dileep, Kunchacko Boban, and Navya Nair. A super-hit romantic comedy!!

page20.title: Kadam Katha
page20.description: The story revolves around two insolvents. One is Giri who owns a textile shop and the other is Cleetus who is running a mechanic shop but to no avail. They are desperately in need of some money and it is then that Sreekumar comes into the scene.

page20.title: Ithinumappuram
page20.description: The story focuses on a woman who marries a man against the wishes of her family only to have him leave her. Will she succeed in bringing up her family all by herself while working at the same factory as her husband?

page20.title: Ma Chu Ka
page20.description: While investigating a story, a journalist crosses path with an advocate. A Malayalam Tamil bilingual psychological thriller film!!

page20.title: Zacharia Pothen Jeevichirippundu
page20.description: Zacharia Pothen, a 40-year-old retired Major, got married only after his retirement and was living happily with his wife.One day, some of his old friends visit him with hidden intentions leading to the occurrence of unexpected things around him.

page20.title: Team  5
page20.description: Akhil is a bike stunter and he secretly does the entire bike stunting stuff as his mother and uncle wont permit him. The film is about one particular incident which forces Akhil to quit bike stunting.

page21.title: Oru Visheshapetta Biriyani kissa
page21.description: The sudden demise of the head cook in the village brings the hopes of the villagers to a standstill until Tara, a blessed cook, comes to the fore to take up the responsibility. A fantasy-comedy movie!!

page21.title: Onpatham Valavinappuram
page21.description: Five young men set out on a trip to Karnataka from Calicut. On their way to their destination, a mansion in Karnataka, the boys experience some fun adventures, which are, both, sweet and sour in their own ways.

page21.title: Diwanjimoola Grand Prix
page21.description: A newly-appointed Thrissur collector takes up the task of cleaning up the city of its shortcomings and rallying people for a noble cause, by bringing back a dirt bike grand prix.

page21.title: Kaaliyan
page21.description: Kaaliyan is a Malayalam movie starring Kulappulli Leela, Meghanathan Nair and Tini Tom in prominent roles. It is an action drama directed by Jijo Pangode.

page21.title: Duryodhana
page21.description: Following the disappearances of their loved ones, two Bravehearts - Captain Ram and a youngster named Siva Surya - set out to find them.

page21.title: Aneezya
page21.description: Aneesya is a Malayalam movie directed by Arjun Binu. Starring Jagadish, Suraj Venjaramood, Biju Kuttan, Dharmajan Bolgatty, M R Gopakumar.

page22.title: History of Joy
page22.description: History of Joy is a coming-of-age drama that narrates the story of a law student, Joy, and his tryst with destiny.

page22.title: Adam Joan
page22.description: A man races against time to save his kidnapped daughter from a satanic cult. A thriller film shot in Kerala and Scotland.

page22.title: Ramaleela
page22.description: Ramanunni, who was the MLA of revolutionary party CDP, crosses over to the opposition as their candidate for the by-election. He procures a revolver and when one of his arch-enemies is gunned down, Ramanunni becomes the suspect.

page22.title: Avarude Ravukal
page22.description: Avarude Raavukal is a motivational youth movie narrating the tale of three disoriented youngsters who meet in a paying guest center run by a mysterious character christened Scobo Jones.

page22.title: Udhaharanam Sujatha
page22.description: A woman juggles menial jobs in an effort to afford her daughter's education.A remake of the 2016 Hindi film Nil Battey Sannata.

page22.title: Varnyathil Aashanka
page22.description: A bunch of thieves is busy robbing a jewelry outlet on a hartal(strike) day and a new member joins them, unwittingly. The operation gets an interesting twist when a few policemen arrive at the scene.

page23.title: Kuntham
page23.description: Kuntham is a Malayalam movie starring Sherin Malaika and Anjal Mohan in prominent roles. It is a crime-thriller directed by Niyas Yemmech with Ratheesh Vegha as musician, forming part of the crew.

page23.title: Sherlock Toms
page23.description: Inspired by Sherlock Holmes books, enforcement officer PL Thomas wants to crack a big case in his first posting. However, his wife's antics lead to the whole case going awry, even pushing him to the point to derangement.

page23.title: Kaattu
page23.description: Set in the rustic terrains during the late 70s, the movie is a slice-of-life tale with lead characters inspired by the short stories of veteran Malayalam director P. Padmarajan.

page23.title: Themmaadikkoottam
page23.description: Four loitering unemployed youngsters take up every sort of job that comes their way. Problems root when the group accidentally develops friction with a gang of hooligans.

page23.title: Thavalam
page23.description: The movie is based on a real-life story of one Muthu who lived around the Ernakulam bus stand.Thavalam is a 2008 Malayalam film by Baiju' starring Suresh Gopi, Rathya and Baby Diya.

page23.title: Sundara Purushan
page23.description: Sundara Purushan is a Malayalam language film. It was released in 2001. The film was a remake of the 1994 Telugu film Shubhalagnam.

page24.title: Spirit
page24.description: Raghunandan's addiction to alcohol takes a heavy toll on his personal and professional life until he decides to sober up.

page24.title: Ulsaha Committee
page24.description: A school dropout dreams of becoming a famous inventor, but has no money to conduct his experiments. His friends decide to help him by stealing a woman's jewelry, but the theft lands his friends and him in trouble.

page24.title: Sound Thoma
page24.description: Thomas is a smart and eligible bachelor. But anyone who hears him speak will dislike him. Because of his disability in speech, he suffers much from his villagers and even near and dear ones.

page24.title: Shakespeare M.A.
page24.description: A talented writer comes up with successful scripts for the theatre he works for. He is asked by the theatre owner to travel to a remote village and write a play based on the life there.

page24.title: Sevenes
page24.description: A team of seven young sevens football players gets involved in crime as a means to quick money.

page24.title: Sarkar Colony
page24.description: A poor government employee, along with his friends, starts a daycare to earn some quick money, but their scheme backfires.

page25.title: Salt N' Pepper
page25.description: The film follows the love stories of two couples. The main characters are Kalidasan, an archaeologist; Maya, a dubbing artiste; Meenakshi, an IELTS student; Manu, a happy-go-lucky management graduate; and Babu, Kalidasan's cook.

page25.title: Role Models
page25.description: College buddies who have gone their separate ways come together help a friend who has lost his way in life.

page25.title: Rock n' Roll
page25.description: A story of a world-renowned bassist Chandramauli trying to impress a singer named Daya by composing music.Rock N' Roll is a 2007 Malayalam musical comedy film written and directed by Ranjith

page25.title: Red Rain
page25.description: The story focuses on a young researcher named Jay who becomes convinced that the strange phenomena are a result of extraterrestrial life. The film was loosely based on the Kerala red rain phenomenon.

page25.title: Red Chillies
page25.description: A group of nine girls is accused of a murder as well as an accident killing 10. They are working in Red Chillies, FM station which is owned by OMR. OMR, who is a Singapore based oil merchant.

page25.title: Spadikam
page25.description: Spadikam is a 1995 Indian Malayalam crime drama film written and directed by Bhadran. The film's name "Spadikam" means "crystal" or "prism", the splitting of light by a prism being a metaphor for human nature.

page26.title: Ramante Edanthottam
page26.description: Elvis and Malini have been married for more than a decade and the element of love has been absent from their life for ages together. Elvis strays outside the relationship often, while Malini leads a quiet life despite being a gifted artiste.

page26.title: Puthumukhangal
page26.description: Puthumukhangal is a 2010 Malayalam film directed by debutants Don Alex and Biju Majeed. The film features new-comers in the lead roles.

page26.title: Punjabi House
page26.description: A man is falsely understood as having disabilities, and this proves to be his good fortune.It became a huge blockbuster being the third highest grossing Malayalam film of 1998.

page26.title: Thenmavin Kombath
page26.description: Best friends fall in love with the same girl.The film emerged as a blockbuster at the Kerala box office and became the highest grossing Malayalam film of 1994.

page26.title: Thilakkam
page26.description: Thilakkam is a 2003 Malayalam comedy film, directed by Jayaraj. Dileep and Kavya Madhavan plays the lead roles in the movie.

page26.title: Thilothama
page26.description: Rosy is a woman of enchanting beauty who sings and dances in a 5 star hotel in the town. She happens to be an eyewitness to a murder that happens in the hotel.

page27.title: Pulijanmam
page27.description: A young graduate who works as a farmer is involved more in local issues and politics than in his personal life. He plans to stage a play for the local arts club; he comes up with the script that is based on a folk god that changes into a tiger.

page27.title: Thirakkatha
page27.description: The film is a tribute to the yesteryear actresses who had been graceful, popular figures in cinema during their younger age with patronage and later got completely disregarded by the industry, media and the masses alike.

page27.title: Progress Report
page27.description: It's all about a young boy Achu who decides to leave his doting parents in Kuttanadu since they are unable to meet his medical expenses.

page27.title: Priyappetta Nattukare
page27.description: Priyappetta Nattukare is a 2011 Malayalam political thriller film directed by debutant Sreejith Palery, starring Kalabhavan Mani, Bala and Lakshmi Sharma in the lead roles.

page27.title: Pottas Bomb
page27.description: The film tracks the eventful course taken by four boys who escape from a child care home.Pottas Bomb is a 2013 Malayalam drama film directed by Suresh.

page27.title: Rasputin
page27.description: Rasputin is a coming of age romantic comedy, Malayalam film directed by Jinu G. Daniel.The film tells the story of three youngsters working in the IT sector in a nondescript urban landscape of Kerala. They are obsessed with sex.

page28.title: Pappayude Swantham Appoos
page28.description: The movie explores the relationship between a father who is depressed after the death of his wife and his neglected son. Badusha won the 1992 Kerala State Film Award for Best Child Artist for his performance.

page28.title: Pakaram
page28.description: Pakaram portrays the tug-of-war between love and revenge.The movie pinpoints on the luxurious life of today's youngsters and the risk taken by them to lead such a life.

page28.title: Udayananu Tharam
page28.description: It depicts the struggles of Udayabhanu, who is an assistant director and screenwriter and who aspires to be a director. But he is thwarted in his attempts by a scheming friend, Rajappan, who steals his screenplay to become superstar Saroj Kumar.

page28.title: Pachuvum Kovalanum
page28.description: Pachuvum Kovalanum is a 2011 Malayalam film directed by Thaha, starring Mukesh, Suraj Venjaramood, Meghna Raj and Jyothirmayi in the lead roles.

page28.title: Outsider
page28.description: The film is about an ordinary middle-class man whose life turns upside down when a criminal tries to control him. It's about his struggles and how he comes to terms with his life.

page28.title: Oru Marubhoomikkadha
page28.description: A Malayali worker learns that his lover is unfaithful and has an adventure in the Gulf region.It is also titled as Arabeem Ottakom P. Madhavan Nayarum.

page29.title: Vadakkumnadhan
page29.description: This is the story of a genius with Bipolar disorder .The film opens with a mother and son coming to Haridwar to perform last rites of her elder son who had run away from home and is believed to have died.

page29.title: Vadakkunokkiyantram
page29.description: Vadakkunokkiyantram is a 1989 Malayalam black comedy film written and directed by Sreenivasan. The film is about the marital discord caused by a husband's inferiority complex.

page29.title: Vallatha Pahayan
page29.description: The film chronicles the dreams of a middle-class man who wants to build a house and later his dreams turn to dust one by one.

page29.title: Valliettan
page29.description: Businessman Madhavanunni seeks to save his brother Appu from jail and gets revenge on his nemesis Shivaraman.

page29.title: Orma Mathram
page29.description: The film revolves around Ajayan, a clerk at a lawyer's office. Ajayan had an inter-caste marriage with Safia long ago.Here happens a tragedy in their life which completely shatters Ajayan and Safia.

page29.title: Vandae Maatharam
page29.description: Gopikrishnan and Anwar, partners on the police force, are disturbed by terrorist infiltrations, and work to counter their actions to save the land.

page31.title: Mr. Bean
page31.description: Mr.Bean is a comedy thriller movie directed by Reji Paul starring Divya Darshan, Maanav, Bijukuttan, Irfan Khan.

page31.title: Vaidooryam
page31.description: A 2013 Malayalam feature film directed by  Shashindra K.Shankar starring  Kailash, Nakshathra, Vijaya Raghavan, Sphadikam George, Jagathy Sreekumar.

page31.title: War & Love
page31.description: A soldier saves the daughter (Laila) of a general during a battle between India and Pakistan.The Indian army is at the Indo-Pak border to rescue the people of a Pak captured village.

page31.title: Minimolude Achan
page31.description: The film depicts the story of a father and daughter who suffers from mental illness. The movie has eight heroines, eight songs and eight stunts.

page31.title: Yodha
page31.description: The movie stars Mohanlal, who is told he is the savior destined to rescue the Rimpoche of a Nepalese Buddhist monastery from practitioners of black magic.

page31.title: Masala Republic
page31.description: The film is about a special squad appointed to curb the use of pan-masala and the impact it leaves on a section of people whose lives depend on it.

page32.title: Manichitrathazhu
page32.description: A young couple moves into an ancient mansion that is believed to be haunted and soon after, sinister things begin to happen.It is considered as one of the best thrillers ever made in India as well as one of the best Malayalam films ever made.

page32.title: Malayali
page32.description: Madhavan (Kalabhavan Mani) is an old-fashioned guy who is loved by everyone in his village. Madhavan loves Malayalam and the Malayalee culture, unlike his brothers Satheeshan (Irshad) and Rameshan (Madhu Warrier).

page32.title: Naughty Professor
page32.description: Over-consciousness about his beauty and glamour gives Professor Viswambaran a "naughty professor" image in the college.Viswambaran often feels overshadowed by his wife's fame and name.

page32.title: Nariman
page32.description: A police officer (Suresh Gopi) tries a different strategy to help a man facing the death sentence. A suspense thriller!!

page32.title: Nammal
page32.description: Snehalatha takes charge as the Principal in a college where Shyam and Sivan are the heroes. Shyam and Sivan are fun-filled characters as well as naughty. Aparna is teased and ragged by the duo, who happens to be the daughter of Principal's friend.

page32.title: Kohinoor
page32.description: The story is set in 1988. Haider who worked for Mumbai underworld develops a plan to steal diamonds from a racket based in Kohinoor textile store in Cherupuzha run by Mamman and Xavier.

page33.title: Kochi
page33.description: A 2011 movie directed by S Kishore, Production by Giri, music by Sasi Thripunithura and starring Nassar, Seetha, Jagadish, Archana Suseelan, Meera Vasudevan, Saju Kodiyan, Sreejith Ravi.

page33.title: Kireedam
page33.description: A sincere police constable wants his son to join the police force as well but things change when he gets transferred. His son keeps getting into trouble with the village gangsters, later is arrested and disowned by his father.

page33.title: Kilukkam
page33.description: A tour guide becomes responsible for a mentally impaired woman whom he believes is wealthy.The film is regarded as one of the best comedy films ever made in Malayalam cinema.

page33.title: Malayalakkara Residency
page33.description: A 2014 Comedy movie starring Jagathy Sreekumar, Innocent, Salim Kumar, Suraj Venjaramoodu, Mammukoya, Bheeman Raghu,  Prem Kumar and others.

page33.title: Lucky Star
page33.description: The film is about how an abandoned child brings a sea change in the life of his proxy parents.The film stars Jayaram and Mukesh alongside Rachana Narayanankutty.

page33.title: Lillies Of March
page33.description: Lilies Of March is a Romantic entertainer, shows college love story of a Ceylon based Tamil girl and three friends.

page34.title: Krishnanum Radhayum
page34.description: This film focuses on the love life of John (Santhosh Pandit) and Radha (Souparnika) who admire each other despite belonging to different religions.

page34.title: Koodaram
page34.description: Koodaram is a 2009 Indian Malayalam film directed by Mammy Century

page34.title: Kadhayile Nayika
page34.description: Nandini is a widow, who is running a home with a salary that is not enough. She works as a part-time marriage broker also and hopes that her brother Siva would someday realize his dreams of becoming an actor.

page34.title: Kadha , Samvidhanam Kunchakko
page34.description: A no-holds money lender decides to turn into a new leaf after marrying the woman he loves, but the path to redemption is tougher than it seems.

page34.title: Kilichundan Mampazham
page34.description: A young man (Mohanlal) tries to rescue the woman (Soundarya) he loves after she is forced into marrying another (Sreenivasan).

page34.title: Kichamani MBA
page34.description: Kichamani a smooth-talking wheeler-dealer who runs a big establishment specialized in bribing officials and making things done from government machinery. The MBA attached to his name stands for Member of Bachelor Association.

page35.title: Kerala Today
page35.description: Kerala Today narrates the story of a tribal youth (Maqbool Salman) who is ready to do any job. Kerala Today raises voice against the atrocities towards todays women and also how the value of relationships delineates.

page35.title: Karinkunnam 6'S
page35.description: Vandana and Aby are outstanding volleyball players. An accident changed Aby's life forever. Aby is so disheartened that his dream will never come true. Vandana sets off to Central Jail to select efficient players to fulfill Aby's wish.

page35.title: Kanaka Simhasanam
page35.description: A couple get an opportunity to revive their failing theatrical company when they are asked to partake in a real-life drama, unfolding within a palace.

page35.title: Kallante Makan
page35.description: Anand is a young boy who has had to live with the brand of a thief's son after his dad is arrested for robbing the temple idol and set in jail.The film also tries to explore the issue of ostracization of a child, whose parents had died of HIV.

page35.title: Kaliyattam
page35.description: The film is an adaptation of William Shakespeare's play Othello against the backdrop of the Hindu Theyyam performance.

page35.title: Kalikaalam
page35.description: Kalikaalam is a 2012 Malayalam drama film written and directed by Reji Nair. Focussing mainly on relationships, it tells the story of a mother and her three children. The film tries to explore the complexities of a small family.

page36.title: Kaalapani
page36.description: Govardhan, a doctor by profession, is wrongly accused of bombing a train and is jailed by the British in Cellular Jail, also known as Kala Pani, in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. He witnesses the sufferings of hundreds of Indian prisoners there.

page36.title: Ithu Pathiramanal
page36.description: Unni Mukundan has had a troubled childhood, what with being witness to his mother being molested and his dad being stabbed by Pradeep Rawat. Years later, Unni Mukundan awaits Pradeep Rawat to emerge from prison to wreak vengeance.

page36.title: Ithu Nammude Katha
page36.description: A remake of 2009 Tamil film Nadodigal.The story revolves around a girl with a lot of problems. She enters the life of a group of three youngsters.

page36.title: Idukki Gold
page36.description: Five friends who studied together reunite after 35 years. They reminisce about both the pleasant and vexatious aspects of their lives.

page36.title: Hero : The Real Hero
page36.description: After Bala, who works for a TV channel, gets into trouble with a goon, he is sent away for an out-of-town assignment. There he meets and falls in love with a girl who gets kidnapped by a gangster.(Malayalam Dubbed Version of Desamuduru )

page36.title: Happy Durbar
page36.description: Happy Durbar is a 2011 Malayalam comedy film directed by Hari Amaravila. The film stars Mukesh and Suraj Venjarammoodu as two CIDs who investigate a missing case.

page37.title: Hallelooya
page37.description: Dr. Roy meets his childhood friend, now a pediatrician, Dr. Meera Menon, after his 23 years in France. They themselves find the memories of their love happened in their childhood.

page37.title: Godha
page37.description: Anjaneya Das hails from a family of wrestlers but loves cricket more. His dad packs him off to Punjab, where he meets Aditi Singh, a passionate wrestler. A series of events lands them both back in Kerala and a new episode of wrestling begins.

page37.title: Girls
page37.description: A group of friends who are doing a diploma course at a Film Institute. As part of their studies, they have to make a movie and the intriguing incidents during their film shoot at the high range form the plot.

page37.title: Geethaanjali
page37.description: A psychologist Dr. Sunny Joseph (Mohanlal) arrives in an old mansion to treat Anjali (Keerthy), who is haunted by her deceased twin sister Geetha (Keerthy) and investigates paranormal activities occurring there.

page37.title: For Sale
page37.description: The film deals with various subjects of social relevance.The influence of Parents lifestyle on the character formation of children, ill effects of alcohol in society, the importance of family which everyone forgets in search fortunes etc. are depicted in it.

page37.title: Elektra
page37.description: A rueful journey into the bruised familial bonds of an aristocratic household in Central Kerala, the film explores desire and loss.Based on the story of the Greek mythological character Electra.

page38.title: Viswasapoorvam Mansoor
page38.description: Set against the background of certain social uncertainties, Viswapoorvam Mansoor highlights the subject of patriotism that exists within the country.

page38.title: Pullikkaran Staraa
page38.description: To escape the bad name of being a womanizer in his native place, Idukki, Rajakumaran relocates to Kochi. However, two women cross his path only to change his life forever.

page38.title: Doctor Love
page38.description: Vinayachandran is mistaken for an expert in resolving issues of love and becomes known as Dr. Love on a college campus.

page38.title: Cleopatra
page38.description: Cleopatra is an emotional family film which concentrates on family bondings.It is directed by Rajan Shankaradi, starring Manoj K. Jayan, Vineeth, Sudha Chandran, and veteran Shankar.

page38.title: Classmates
page38.description: Years after graduating from college, a few friends decide to get together for a reunion. But on the night of the reunion, one of them is almost killed and goes into a coma.

page38.title: Chronic Bachelor
page38.description: Chronic Bachelor is a 2003 Malayalam romantic comedy-drama film about the life of Sathyaprathapan, a bachelor as mentioned in the title.

page39.title: Chemmeen
page39.description: The film tells the story of a pre-marital and later extra-marital relationship between Karuthamma, the daughter of an ambitious Hindu fisherman, and Pareekutty, the son of a Muslim trader.An evergreen classic!!

page39.title: Camel Safari
page39.description: Dia is a management student at Mangalore. She and four of her friends visit Rajasthan for 15 days to attend a marriage. There she meets a Rajput boy Pavan and falls in love with him.

page39.title: Garbhasreeman
page39.description: Sudeendran becomes a scapegoat to the famous gynecologist and scientist Dr Roy Mathew who is in search of a man to try his experiment on. He has made the male ones of animals pregnant and has to do the experiment on a man.

page39.title: Bunny
page39.description: Bunny is Malayalam Dubbed Version action-masala film of Bunny Telugu Movie.This film stars Allu Arjun in the lead role and Prakash Raj and Gowri Munjal in other roles.

page39.title: Breaking News Live
page39.description: 'Breaking News Live' visualizes the story of Nayana and Sneha. The plot moves forward with the many people who Nayana come across in her life.

page39.title: Blackberry
page39.description: Don (Baburaj) considers himself the main goon in his city. Once at a cinema theatre, Don loses his mobile phone and all his activities are disturbed due to this.Dons attempts to get back his phone results in many humorous situations.

page40.title: Black Ticket To Hell
page40.description: Black Ticket To Hell is a Malayalam romantic action thriller movie, starring Saikumar, Premkumar, Anil Murali, Siva, Sajeer Sadaf And Anjana Menon and others. Directed by Udayachandran.

page40.title: Beware Of Dogs
page40.description: Four friends rent a house and always manage to get in trouble with their landlord. One day, the group is forced to leave this rented house and flee to Pondicherry where a new journey awaits them.

page40.title: Beautiful
page40.description: Two friends -- one a wealthy paraplegic (Jayasurya) and the other a poor musician (Anoop Menon) -- share a deep bond.

page40.title: Ayaal Sassi
page40.description: Sassi, a self-proclaimed painter in his 60s, tries to make a mark in the society but fails with every attempt. He is soon diagnosed with a terminal illness, following which he moves back to his hometown to spend his last few days.

page40.title: Aattakatha
page40.description: The main plot of the film involves a French woman, played by German actor Irina Jacobi, who comes to Kerala to study Kathakali, and her relationship with a Kathakali actor called Unni (Vineeth).

page40.title: Adventures of Omanakuttan
page40.description: Omanakuttan is a luckless, introvert. After being spurned by a colleague due to his inferior personality, he decides to market himself better and pretends as different people to impress girls.

page42.title: 3 Dots
page42.description: Three ex-convicts live together and try to start their lives afresh but in vain. They reach out to their prison counselor; as per his advice, they start their own work with his support until his true intentions are revealed.

page42.title: Sunday Holiday
page42.description: A college lecturer finally gets a chance to pitch his movie idea to a successful film director who is hospitalized and bored.

page42.title: Njandukalude Nattil Oridavela
page42.description: A family deals with the mother's serious health scare in varying and often hysterical ways.

page42.title: Thondimuthalum Driksakshiyum
page42.description: A bus trip turns to disaster after a thief steals a woman's gold chain and her husband's name.

page42.title: Matchbox
page42.description: The film is about four friends and the strong bond they share.Matchbox, as the name suggests, is about how a few people fit perfectly in a box, or a society.A coming-of-age film!!

page42.title: Nadakame Ulakam
page42.description: Nadakame Ulakam is a 2011 Malayalam-language comedy film directed by Viji Thampi and starring Mukesh, Vinu Mohan, Sarayu, and Saranya Mohan in the lead roles.

page43.title: Comrade In America
page43.description: A comrade's illegal journey to the United States to stop his girlfriend's wedding doesn't turn out to be easy as hurdles welcome him on every step.

page43.title: Take Off
page43.description: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

page43.title: Puthan Panam
page43.description: Nithyananda Shenoy takes revenge against an ex-minister who swindles him on the hours before sudden demonetization is made known to public. In the sideline at the underbelly of Kochi survival story of Muthuvel and his mother Sundari is shown.

page43.title: Himalayathile Kashmalan
page43.description: The plot is about a man who gets trapped in a situation and how his three friends try to rescue him. It later snowballs into the issue of an entire village.

page43.title: Vietnam Colony
page43.description: Two men tries to persuade a bunch of colony residents to relocate to another location for the sake of a corporate project, while the residents including a number of goons, comes in their way.

page43.title: Ottaal
page43.description: An orphaned boy goes to live with his grandfather in the country, but his new life takes an unexpected turn when his grandfather's health begins to fail.

page44.title: Nadodikkattu
page44.description: After losing their jobs, Dasen and Vijayan don't see any chances to get work in Kerala. So they try to escape to the Middle East, but they end up in Tamil Nadu and where mistaken as 2 CIDs by a group of smuglers.

page44.title: Minnaram
page44.description: A man's dreams of a married life shatters when his ex-girlfriend shows up with a baby and claims that it's his child.

page44.title: Achayans
page44.description: The Thottathil family set out on a journey to find extreme fun and enjoyment. Accidentally, two girls join their journey. The rest of the journey unfolds with lots of twists and turns.

page44.title: Rakshadhikari Baiju Oppu
page44.description: Rakshadikari Baiju Oppu explores the story of a funny and good-hearted man Baiju, who is a Government employee and also a patron at the Brothers Club in Kumbalam.

page44.title: Sakhavu
page44.description: A student political leader who fights for his left-wing ideals. When some people try to use him in order to fulfill their intentions he is forced to fight for his ideals.

page44.title: Kattappanayile Rithwik Roshan
page44.description: A young man (Vishnu Unnikrishnan) struggles to realize his dream of becoming a film actor.

page45.title: Oru Mexican Aparatha
page45.description: Set in a government college in Ernakulam, the plot revolves around the journey of two students Paul and Subhash in how they bring about a change in their campus politics with their brand of ideologies.

page45.title: Fukri
page45.description: An engineering dropout, Lucky is in pursuit of quick moneymaking plans but finds himself trapped in one trouble after the other. Once he meets a college girl Nafsi and her cousin Sana, and his life takes a new turn.

page45.title: Georgettans Pooram
page45.description: The son of a Catholic priest is expected to follow in his father's footsteps, but grows in values opposite to the onus of priesthood. A comedy entertainer!!

page45.title: Baahubali 2 The Conclusion
page45.description: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.(Dubbed Malayalam Version)

page45.title: 10 Kalpanakal
page45.description: Movie progresses through three different phases in the life of Davis George, a forest officer. He leads a contented life with his wife Sara and son. Certain unexpected tragedies wreck the smooth flow of their life.

page45.title: 1971 Beyond Borders
page45.description: The story of the 1971 war between two neighboring nations is told from the perspective of a soldier. It is the fourth installment in the Major Mahadevan film series, with Mohanlal reprising his role as Colonel Mahadevan.

page46.title: Alamara
page46.description: The film is about how a cupboard, gifted to the groom by the brides family, drives a wedge between the young couple and aggravates the misunderstandings that arise from petty ego issues of the duos parents.

page46.title: Angamaly Diaries
page46.description: Vincent Pepe, a young boy from Angamaly, who has a traditional upbringing grows up to become a righteous yet a notorious gangster. An inherently aggressive person, he tries to establish his monopoly over the lucrative Pork business in the village.

page46.title: Sathya
page46.description: Sathya is a daredevil of sorts, who is also an expert rummy player. He found Rosy in a dance bar, and is on the way to Goa with her while the baddies chase them. Where is he taking her?

page46.title: Honey Bee 2 Celebrations
page46.description: Seban and Angela like each other and are all set to get hitched. Post a few dramatic episodes, their relatives also nod a yes to the alliance. Now, what else can play spoilsport in their equation?

page46.title: The Great Father
page46.description: A malevolent policeman has a run-in with a man who owns a construction company, and who is trying hard to be a hero for his daughter.

page46.title: C O Saira Banu
page46.description: In a bad turn of events, Joshua and Banu's life is shaken when Joshua becomes the convict in a court case. This is when Annie John Tharavadi, a reputed advocate becomes part of these happenings.

page47.title: Arjun(2009)
page47.description: A Malayalam Dubbed version of Anjaneyulu 2009 Telugu Movie.A news reporter joins a gang incognito to expose corrupt politicians as well as find out who killed his parents.

page47.title: Chakravyuham
page47.description: A man's (N.T.R. Rao Junior) girlfriend (Samantha Ruth Prabhu) persuades him to pose as her friend's (Kajal Aggarwal) love interest to stop an arranged marriage. Malayalam Dubbed Version of Brindavanam 2010 Telugu Movie.

page47.title: Homely Meals
page47.description: There are lot of people who are waiting for a chance in Television and film industry. Homely Meals is the story of one such character Alan. The movie is all about the life, dreams and passion of current generation.

page47.title: Rajamma @ Yahoo
page47.description: 2 brothers, Michael Rajamma aka Rajamma and Vishnu Yohannan aka Yahoo are born to an inter caste couple. After sudden demise of their parents they live in a bungalow and later the duo plans to rent out their bungalow to different families.

page47.title: Anyar
page47.description: Raziya is an investigative TV reporter, who happens to be in Ahmedabad during the Gujarat riots. She takes the pictures of the communal violence on her Handycam but back home in Kerala, there are no takers for her pictures.

page47.title: Bus Conductor
page47.description: A bus conductor takes on a wily cop who runs a bus company on the sly and looks after a pregnant girl.

page48.title: Husbands In Goa
page48.description: The film follows the journey of three young men, who flee from their wives, for a vacation to Goa. During the trip, they become friends with an immature youthful older man, who is on the verge of a divorce.

page48.title: Aathmakatha
page48.description: Two blind people marry and have a child; after the mother dies in an accident, the father brings up the child. While appearing for her board exams, she finds out, to her dismay, that she's losing her vision and will turn blind soon.

page48.title: Onnum Onnum Moonu
page48.description: Onnum Onnum Moonu is a 2015 Malayalam comedy drama anthology film which will have three films in it, namely Kulukki Sarbath, Sabdarekha and Devi.

page48.title: Oru Yakshi Kadha
page48.description: Hari Narayanan a serial director happens to make expedition at Krishnapuram Kovilakam. While moving ahead with his investigation to find out the secret behind Urmila and Alex's murder, Hari Narayan faces lots of difficulties and hurdles.

page48.title: Indrajith
page48.description: Indrajith tells the story of a son who is brought up by his father to be a bigger rowdy than himself. 'Chembarunthu Bhaskaran,' the father wanted his son Bhasi to be a goonda, to protect his family against his enemies who were targeting them.

page48.title: Avan
page48.description: In this film, Vijay Yesudas is playing the role of an established singer. The reality show named Crime And Music is the background of the story. The specialty of this reality show is that it features a number of convicts taking part in the competition.

page49.title: Kochavva Paulo Ayyappa Coelho
page49.description: Ayappa's strongly wishes to travel by airplane. Kochavva helps the child to achieve this through his optimistic and practical ways. Ayappa learns what you love is important than what you wish in life.

page49.title: Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol
page49.description: This onscreen adaptation of the story 'Pranayopanishad' (The Upanishad of Love) follows Ulahannan, a middle-aged government servant, through his emotional journey of misconceptions and love.

page49.title: Ezra
page49.description: A young married woman (Priya Anand) purchases an antique Jewish box, unaware that it houses a horror.

page49.title: Jomonte Suvisheshangal
page49.description: A wayward youth of a rich father, Jomon is a carefree youngster who doesnt care about being responsible enough for his age. When the family lands in a financial soup out of the blue, a different side of the youngster surprisingly emerges.

page49.title: Aby
page49.description: A youngster who never outgrows his childhood fascination for airplanes and flying, Aby is emotionally a kid. He understands the language of science the best but his dream of making an aircraft is hardly considered sensible by his villagers or family.

page49.title: Kappiri Thuruthu
page49.description: The story of the film goes through the time of H. Mehboob, who tell us the story of the slavers and Jews, who worked for the Dutch and Britishers who ruled over India. It tells us the songs of Cochin that go beyond caste, creed and nation.

page50.title: Mathru Vandanam
page50.description: Saraswati Ammal and her son Raju lives with her daughter. Raju, who was clever at his young age, becomes mentally challenged at a particular point in his life. Raju and his mother are expelled from the home. Based on a true incident!!

page50.title: Arikil Oraal
page50.description: Sidharth works in advertising and has a girlfriend Veena. When Veena introduces him to Ichaa, a dear friend who works as a cafe help in the city, Sidharth does not think twice about him. Until Ichaa starts appearing at two events simultaneously.

page50.title: Apothecary
page50.description: Apothecary is a thriller, set in the backdrop of a cancer hospital. It follows a doctor and an ailing patient and the chilling events that take place there.

page50.title: Manjadikuru
page50.description: A story of homecoming from late 1970s, when 10 year old Vicky arrives at his grandparents home in rural Kerala to attend his grandfather's funeral. The disjointed family gathers together for the sixteen day long funeral period.

page50.title: Ithihasa
page50.description: Alby and Vikki are two clever thieves who are into pickpocketing.Once they chance upon a special loot, which turns out to be a magical ring which has the power of switching the bodies of the two people who wear it simultaneously.

page50.title: Konthayum Poonoolum
page50.description: A baker (Kunchacko Boban) rushes home to be with his heavily pregnant wife (Bhama), who has been left alone. There is his dear jobless friend (Shine Tom Chacko), whom he meets up with, once he is back home.

page51.title: Bhaiyya Bhaiyya
page51.description: Babumon (Kunchacko Boban) and Bengali Babu (Biju Menon) have a peculiar relation which dates back to the day the elder one among the two, came to Kerala. The film revolves around a journey to Bengal carrying the mortal remains of a laborer.

page51.title: Police Maman
page51.description: Shankaranunni is an eccentric cop in thePolice Dept. with lackadaisical characteristics and is married to Lekshmy, the only daughter of a senseless politician. Instead of serving his duty or investigate crimes, he likes to remain at his home.

page51.title: Ezhu Sundara Rathrikal
page51.description: Aby, a hotshot ad-film maker, decides to get married after a painful and failed romance. He had remained a bachelor for long time but finally, agrees to get married to one of his models Ann. Seven days before the wedding, Aby hosts a bachelor party.

page51.title: Njaan
page51.description: Based on the acclaimed novel K T N Kottur Ezhuthum Jeevithavum by T. P. Rajeevan, which is set in the backdrop of India's freedom struggle and depicts a magical history of a Kerala village.

page51.title: Left Right Left
page51.description: A classic political thriller pans through the lives of three different characters with different ideologies and living styles. It sketches the making of the political stalwart, a Sub-Inspector of police and a political activist, traumatized into paralysis.

page51.title: Tourist Home
page51.description: the highlight of the film is that the entire story is filmed using a single shot. It is arguably the first Indian film to be made using this technique. The film traces a series of incidents that take place in the 10 rooms of a tourist home.

page52.title: Shutter
page52.description: It is about a chaos created by 3 men, an NRI, a film director and an auto driver after they meet a strange woman in bizarre circumstance. It became the first Indian movie to be remade in 6 languages within the shortest span of time.

page52.title: Thira
page52.description: The film`s story revolves around the character Rohini who is a Cardiologist and a social worker. Rohini runs an organization to help women, orphaned girls and to stop human trafficking.

page52.title: RajadhiRaja
page52.description: The story of Shekharan Kutty, a simple man who loves and cares for his wife and daughter. But his normal life is turned upside down with the arrival of a relative, and now Shekharan must fight back to safeguard his integrity and his family.

page52.title: God for Sale
page52.description: God for Sale is a satirical take on what all determines the faith of a person. The film opens with the arrest of Poornananda Swami who is alleged to perform child sacrifice. His story is unveiled through versions put forth by the accused and his brother.

page52.title: Swapaanam
page52.description: Unequaled in the art of playing the Chenda (a drum), Unni, and Nalini, peerless in Mohiniyattam (a dance) are drawn to each other by an affection that transcends the devotion to their arts and the love for each other.

page52.title: Darvinte Parinamam
page52.description: The movie revolves around the life of a man and a local goon and the story narrates how some unfortunate events change their lives.

page55.title: Color Balloon
page55.description: Sukhu, Seetha, and their son Appu are a family who lives in the village called  Thekkethara . A good student, Appu is held in high esteem amongst his teachers. Disaster strikes the family when  Sukhu, dies from HIV/AIDS. Based on a real-life story!!

page55.title: Kadaksham
page55.description: A women oriented movie which states the story of how women has to survive against all odds even now in the society which still has a contemporary outlook.

page55.title: Inspector Dawood Ibrahim
page55.description: Inspector Dawood Ibrahim who dreams of becoming a cop. His sole aim is to catch lawbreakers. The movie is all about how he fulfills his dreams.

page55.title: Shajahanum Pareekuttiyum
page55.description: Jiya is a rich girl who has a distinctive personality and has great hopes and dreams. An unfortunate incident shook her life. At this juncture two guys Pranav and Prince enter Jiya's life with definite intentions.

page55.title: Marubhoomiyile Aana
page55.description: An unemployed youngster from Kerala who leaves for the Gulf to seek his fortune. The fortune he finds is a Sheikh who comes with him back to Kerala. The various escapades of the Sheikh in Kerala is what the movie is all about.

page55.title: Valleem Thetti Pulleem Thetti
page55.description: Valliyum Thetti Pulliyum Thetti Movie is set in a village in Palaghat. A C-class theater and a festival that lasts for a period of ten days form the background of the story.

page56.title: Angane Thanne Nethave Anjettennam Pinnale
page56.description: The village of Kanakkodu is free of politics and political parties. Pala Thankachen spread the seeds of politics in the calm atmosphere prevalent there. Consequently, the villagers divide themselves into different political groups.

page56.title: Swarna Kaduva
page56.description: Rini Iype Mattummel, is a man whose sole aim is to make money within the short span of time. He will do anything to make money.

page56.title: Thoppil Joppan
page56.description: Joppan's failed romance excuses him to be an alcoholic. Hoping to start a new life, he seeks out for some love but would fate favor him this time?

page56.title: School Bus
page56.description: Joseph and Aparna are a couple with two children. Their son Aakash is a troublemaker and often rebuked for it. The intervention of certain characters makes their life highly complicated and the children too get affected.

page56.title: Welcome To Central Jail
page56.description: Unnikuttan is a young man, who was born in the central jail. He considers jail as his second home. As a good Samaritan he takes on the punishments for petty crimes committed by others.

page56.title: Pa Va
page56.description: PA..VA (Pappanekurichum Varkiyekurichum) is a family satire, which views life from a humorous angle and finds humour in the saddest moments of life. It ascertains the fact that there is laughter even for tears.

page59.title: Sankaranum Mohananum
page59.description: Jayasurya is a fashion photographer living in Kochi. He was earlier based in Mumbai and is separated from his wife, a model and an aspiring actor who lives in Mumbai with their child. His older brother Sankaran is a school teacher in Malabar.

page59.title: Trivandrum Lodge
page59.description: A small residential lodge at Kochi becomes the witness for many stories, of many people, their search for love, money, sex, and true meaning of life.

page59.title: Rasaleela
page59.description: Unni Maya (Prathishta), a widow in a big tharavadu, develops a fondness for Devan (Darshan), who has accompanied a godman, who has been called in to get rid of the bad omens that surround the family.

page59.title: Rani Padmini
page59.description: The story revolves around two women Rani and Padmini who are on a journey from Kochi to Himachal Pradesh with different purposes.

page59.title: Pranayam
page59.description: Sudden illness brings a divorced couple (Jaya Prada, Anupam Kher) back together

page59.title: Poppins
page59.description: An adaptation of the Sahitya Akademi award-winning play 8 Natakangal by Jayaprakash Kuloor. It is centered on man-woman relationships, exploring different aspects of the institution called marriage.

page60.title: Philips And The Monkey Pen
page60.description: The movie is about Roy Philip and his son, Regen Philip. They own a very rare pen, called the Monkey Pen which was gifted to Regen by his grandfather, Richard Philip. The plot describes the emotional attachment of the boy towards the pen.

page60.title: Unnam
page60.description: This movie is a remake of the Hindi film, Johnny Gaddar.Five men and a corrupt cop plan a con to make quick cash, but the deal goes sour.

page60.title: Money Back Policy
page60.description: A man with a well to do job and a happy family keeps complaining about his not so lavish life, when he is least expecting the favor of luck, it strikes and he gets an ancestorial jackpot. His envy against the world doesn't end there.

page60.title: Maad Dad
page60.description: Easo is a proud father to Mariya. Being a father he is protective of Mariya but knows exactly where to draw the line. He knows what's best for her and never lets his protective nature hinder Mariya's.

page60.title: Lisammayude Veedu
page60.description: Lisammayude Veedu tells the story of a woman who had to suffer a series of gruesome rapes and court trials as a girl.This film, a sequel to Achanurangatha Veedu, presents Meera Jasmine in the lead role, to which she adds loads of boldness and vitality.

page60.title: Kerala Cafe
page60.description: On a common theme of journeys, each filmmaker presents their cinematic impression of contemporary times in Kerala. Malayalam anthology film produced by Ranjith and directed by a team of ten directors.

page61.title: Idiots
page61.description: `Idiots` is the story of Fredi, Messi and Arthi and an incident that transforms all their lives. Asif Ali and Sanusha will be seen in `Idiot`.

page61.title: Doctor Innocent Aanu
page61.description: The protagonist (Innocent) is a Homeopathic doctor and this has been shown to be adding to his woes. His wife (Sona Nair) is least impressed by the stream of medicine and is often seen advising all and sundry.

page61.title: Vettah
page61.description: Two police officers trapped in a web of deception and lies from everyone they trust after they take up a case involving a mysterious man who is arrested for a double homicide.

page61.title: Kukkiliyar
page61.description: Kukkiliyar is the name given to the old man by the villagers, as he was not ready to reveal his real name and nativity. He is around seventy and lives a lonely life in the temple premises.

page61.title: Kalimannu
page61.description: The film re-narrates a famous tale of Mahabharata of Abhimanyu and his mother Subhadra. The film depicts the present time where a relationship of a mother and her baby is shown before and after its birth.

page61.title: Hallo
page61.description: Shivaraman is a once-brilliant advocate who now seems to be in a self-destructive mode. All the time he is portrayed in a highly intoxicated state. Whenever Shivaraman gets into one of his drunken brawls, it is his friend, Chandy, who rescues him.

page62.title: Ettekaal Second
page62.description: Sandeep discovers love when he meets Neethu. Everything is perfect except that Sandeep happens to be a car driver's son and Neethu his boss's daughter. And not just that she is engaged to be married in a few months time.

page62.title: Calendar
page62.description: A high-school dropout, struggling to make his business venture work, falls in love with the daughter of a widow, but her mother does not approve of their relationship. A few years later, a doctor falls in love with the same woman.

page62.title: Track
page62.description: Track is a Malayalam drama movie, directed by K.P Venu. The cast of Track includes K.P.Venu,Rahul Madhav.

page62.title: Narasimham
page62.description: The story of how Induchoodan exacts his revenge after being wrongly convicted of a heinous crime.

page62.title: Madhya Venal
page62.description: 'Madhyavenal' tells the story of Kumaran (Manoj K. Jayan) and his wife Sarojini (Shwetha Menon), who have dedicated their lives for the upliftment of the working classes.

page62.title: Kottarathil Kuttybhootam
page62.description: Directed by debutant duo Kumar Nanda and Basheer, Kottarathil Kutty Bhootham tells the story of a group of robbers, three children and a funny police officer.

page63.title: Arya 2 (Dubbed)
page63.description: An unstable and unpredictable guy causes havoc for his 'best friend' and lover.Arya 2 is a sequel of blockbuster movie Arya. It is a romantic comedy entertainer. In which, Allu Arjun is playing the role of a software engineer in this movie.

page63.title: Aakkramanam
page63.description: Aakkramanam is an Indian film in the Malayalam language by Sreekumaran Thampi starring Madhu, Jayan, Balan K. Nair, Sathaar, Sreevidya, and Jayabharathi.

page63.title: Sufi Paranja Katha
page63.description: Karthy belongs to a prestigious Hindu tharavadu. She falls in love with a Muslim trader named Maamootty and starts living in his house after converting to Islam. But she doesn't give up her original beliefs of her original religion Hinduism.

page63.title: Unto The Dusk
page63.description: Compulsion from parents and relatives cause a youth to reach the seminary. Though pursuing the path of St. Francis of Assissi, the challenges and conflicts in life and seminary transforms him revengeful and quits the place.

page63.title: Plus Or Minus
page63.description: Three street kids are looked after by Ashok, a street singer. When a lawyer (Roopasree) comes to their rescue, a ray of hope falls by and life finally starts looking up for them.

page63.title: Kaattu Kallan
page63.description: Kaattu Kallan is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Chandrakumar and produced by TK Balachandran. The film stars Prem Nazir, Sukumaran, Seema and Jagathy Sreekumar in lead roles. The film has a musical score by A. T. Ummer.

page64.title: Itha Ivide Vare
page64.description: Itha Ivide Vare is a 1977 Indian Malayalam film, directed by IV Sasi and produced by Hari Pothan. The film stars Madhu, Sharada, Jayabharathi and MG Soman in lead roles

page64.title: Irakal
page64.description: Irakal is a 1985 Malayalam psychological thriller film written and directed by K. G. George and produced by the then prominent actor Sukumaran. The film is an in-depth exploration of the psychology of violence.

page64.title: Avalariyathe
