page64.description: Avalariyathe is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Asha Khan, starring Prathapachandran and Sathaar in the lead roles.

page64.title: Annoru Ravil
page64.description: Annoru Ravil is a 1986 Indian Malayalam film, directed by MR Joseph and produced by MR Joseph. The film stars Jagathy Sreekumar, Ratheesh, Nahas and Sukumaran in lead roles. The film had musical score by Raveendran.

page64.title: Valiya Chirakulla Pakshikal
page64.description: The film explores the disastrous environmental and public health consequences of the pesticide misuse. The film depicts the after-effects of the pesticide spraying through the eyes of a photographer

page64.title: Monsoon Mangoes
page64.description: D.P Pallickal, an amateur film maker who claims he is the next film legend. D.P has great passion, but lacks talent. His family and friends constantly make fun of his amateurishness of his masterpiece short films.

page65.title: Mayapuri
page65.description: A village on the riverbanks with a scent of Valluvanaadan (Palghat) slang. A walk through the village road will take you to an old ancestral home, that would tower over you with silence, mysteries and folk tales about a distant past.

page65.title: Maya Malika
page65.description: This movie is Written & Directed by Satheesh Poduvaal. The cast includes Sreenivasan,Sai Kumar,Jagathy,Nedumudi Venu, Vijayaraghavan,T G Ravi,Swetha Menon,Kripa & others.

page65.title: Akashvani
page65.description: Movie narrates the story of a couple, Akash and Vani. They go on a personal trip to spend some quality time with each other and the resulting incidents are plotted.

page65.title: Ideal Couple
page65.description: A couple wins some reality show as the best couple on TV, and Aashaan, an ex-burglar and his team, plan a final operation to loot them of the prize money.

page65.title: Pattanathil Sundaran
page65.description: A man's ego gets hurt when his college-educated wife (Navya Nair) gets a successful job. Shows the difficulties of a family in which the wife (Navya) works and the husband (Dileep) is left to take care of the house.

page65.title: Perinoru Makan
page65.description: Perinoru Makan, is about an extremely affectionate father and the bond he shares with his daughter, and how he is clinging onto it. He is so attached to his daughter that he is hunting for a groom who is willing to stay in his house.

page66.title: Nirakazhcha
page66.description: Nirakazhcha tells the story of an Italian painter who visits Kerala to recreate the magnificent Raja Ravi Varma paintings.

page66.title: Mla Mani
page66.description: The movie is about a political goon, Mani, who mends his ways and becomes a popular MLA. Mani is a trusted thug can do anything for the political party he belongs to, with the belief that he is doing it for the public's interests.

page66.title: Mullavalliyum Thenmavum
page66.description: Shelly and Rajasree are students at fine arts college and they fall in love during college days. Their parents oppose for their marriage and they elope and end up with Dr. Alex.

page66.title: My Big Father
page66.description: The film exhibits a deep bonding between a son, Alby (Jayaram), and his father, Kunjumon (Ajaykumar), a dwarf. Things changes after Kunjumon faces a critical accident , which affects Alby's marriage-life.

page66.title: My Boss
page66.description: The film follows Manu who's hired as the executive assistant who aspires to migrate to a foreign country while Priya, his boss, has visa problems at a time when she has the opportunity to get a promotion. Loosely based on The Proposal 2009 movie.

page66.title: Keralotsavam 2009
page66.description: Padmanabhan Embranthiri  is running an institution viz. 'Kalanikethan' . He is invited to perform the Kerala art forms on the stage of a cultural festival named Keralotsavam 2009.

page67.title: Kili Poyi
page67.description: Chacko and Hari, tired of their advertising jobs, take a trip to Goa. They return with a mysterious bag which changes the life of both.Kili Poyi is considered to be the first Indian stoner film. An Adult Entertainer!!

page67.title: Killadi
page67.description: Malayalam Dubbed of Telugu Movie Vedam.The lives of a slum dweller who works as a cable operator, a prostitute, a debt-ridden weaver and an upcoming rock star are all interwoven into one.

page67.title: Kochi To Kodambakkam
page67.description: Kochi To Kodambakkam Is a 2012 Malayalam Romantic film directed by Venu Pradeep written by S.Chandran, Produced by:S.Sasikumar

page67.title: Grandmaster
page67.description: A veteran cop chases a cold-blooded serial killer, who murders his victims in alphabetical order.An edge of the seat thriller, a cat and mouse game involving a veteran cop (Mohanlal).

page67.title: Hide N' Seek
page67.description: Naveen, played by Divyadarsan and Gauri, played by Natasha are a happily married couple. Both of them are I.T. Professionals but things take a turn when Solomon (Mukesh) joins their family.

page67.title: Josettante Hero
page67.description: The film is about a debt-ridden film producer and how he realizes his dream of making a good film.

page68.title: Thaskara Lahala
page68.description: Manikantan, Ayyappan, Govindankutty and Maimunni are the natives of a village called Kurukkumkara. They offer to help a girl in the village and try to marry her off with the money that they get through the staging of their drama `Pazhassi Thampuran`.

page68.title: Ben
page68.description: The story of a boy named Ben who enjoys his simple countryside life and is forced to move to a highly ranked school where he doesn't fit in. The rest of the movie shows how Ben is driven mentally insane by his selfish mother.

page68.title: Varan
page68.description: Malayalam Dubbed Version of Telugu Movie Varudu.A man's parents ask him to get married after he gets a job in the United States of America; he agrees. But on the day of the marriage, the bride is kidnapped by goons.

page68.title: Ordinary
page68.description: An accident interlinks the life of a driver and conductor of a KSRTC ordinary bus running from Pathanamthitta to Gavi with the lives of people of Gavi.

page68.title: Jo And The Boy
page68.description: An aspiring animation creator's dreams start coming true when she is met with a charismatic young boy.

page68.title: Raghuvinte Swantham Raziya
page68.description: The film shows how terrorist outfits use the money to lure unemployed youth to do their bidding. A mentally challenged young woman wanders on the city streets creating a lot of commotion. Many people, including policemen, take advantage of her.

page69.title: Thousand
page69.description: Jikku Mon (Bharath) an autistic youngster is sent to the ATM by his dad (Mukesh) with the Pin number written on a 1000 rupee currency note. As luck would have it, the note gets blown away from Jikku Mon's hands, and soon disappears from view.

page69.title: Female Unnikrishnan
page69.description: This film is about a man with a female voice and the events and situations that arise in his life. Suraj Venjaramoodu plays the lead role who finds it hard to find a bride because of his female voice.

page69.title: Kanalaattam
page69.description: Malayalam Dubbed Version of Okkadine Telugu Movie.Shailaja comes in contact with a happy family when she visits her friend's village. Things take turn when she learns that they all died two years back.

page69.title: Bujjigadu
page69.description: "Rudran" Mr Munna Made in Chennai is a 2008 telugu ( bujjigadu )dubbed malayalam film directed by Puri Jagannadh and produced by A N Balaji. Prabhas plays the lead role with Trisha Krishnan ,Sanjana galrani, mohan babu.

page69.title: Saigal Padukayanu
page69.description: The movie revolves around Chandra Babu, who has a great passion for music which he has inherited from his father.

page69.title: Kasaba
page69.description: Rajan Zachariah, an Inspector of Police working in the Palakkad District on the Kerala-Karnataka border, investigates a murder case that is very important to him.

page70.title: White
page70.description: White is a romance about a middle-aged banker living in London, who falls in love with a 25-year old woman.

page70.title: Ustad Hotel
page70.description: An urbane chef from a well-to-do family with very high ambitions goes on to find approval from his conservative father, true love and the real purpose of his life.

page70.title: Kammatipaadam
page70.description: Krishnan, a 42 year old man returns to his hometown Kammattipaadam on the call of his childhood friend Ganga.

page70.title: Oru Murai Vanthu Paarthaya
page70.description: Prakashan runs an electrical hardware shop and is known by all the people of that village. As the story progresses, the entry of a mysterious girl in Prakshan's life unfolds a lot of suspense and comical moments.

page70.title: Jacobinte Swargarajyam
page70.description: The struggles faced by a business man and his family in Dubai to stabilize themselves after getting cheated by a fraudster.

page70.title: James & Alice
page70.description: James and Alice marry against their parent's wishes and the movie revolves around the misunderstandings between them caused by their busy lifestyles. Things take a turn when James meets with a freak car accident.

page71.title: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
page71.description: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

page71.title: Nee Na
page71.description: A married couple finds tension in their relation and life due to the intervention of an alcoholic and impulsive young woman.

page71.title: La Sa Gu
page71.description: A small government school in a Kerala district experiences a sudden change in its students and teachers as mysterious questions about specific students appear in different spots of the school.

page71.title: Marykkundoru Kunjaadu
page71.description: Solomon, a simple village man who is afraid of almost everything around him. His life changes when he becomes a good friend with a tough man.

page71.title: Amen
page71.description: Sosanna is a member of the church choir. Solomon is a sacristan in the village`s local church and he falls in love with Sosanna who also happens to be the daughter of a wealthy, aristocratic contractor. Their love leads them to many unexpected events.

page71.title: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja
page71.description: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja is a 2009 Malayalam historical drama film based on the life of Pazhassi Raja, a Hindu king who fought against the British in the 18th century.

page72.title: Christian Brothers
page72.description: Christy (Mohan Lal) is framed for killing the kidnapper of the home minister's daughter while trying to save her and now he has to prove his innocence to his father.

page72.title: 2 Harihar Nagar
page72.description: The four friends are back in town, to re-live the old days. But problems arise when one of them goes missing and an enemy from their past tries to hunt them down.A sequel to In Harihar Nagar (1990) and prequel to In Ghost House Inn(2010).

page72.title: King Liar
page72.description: After falling in love with an aspiring fashion model, a conman attempts to get her work with India's top fashion design company

page72.title: Leela (Malayalam)
page72.description: Kuttiyappan is an unmarried 40 something, who lives a careless life, loves to create one-night relationships with women.

page72.title: Jamna Pyari
page72.description: Vasoottan an auto driver by profession, who is very good at heart and meanwhile he is an impetuous person. Once a MBA student happens to travel his auto with some hidden purposes.

page72.title: Mythri
page72.description: Mythri is a social drama and tells the tale of a lost childhood, as seen through the eyes of the protagonist played by Mysore-based theater artist Aditya. The film focuses on relationships during the time of liberalization.(Malayalam Dubbed Version)

page73.title: Akkaldhamayile Pennu
page73.description: Movie narrates the story of three generations of women who have lived in Akkaldama, protagonist Xavi's wife Anges, her daughter Maria and granddaughter - who are the representatives of the times they grew up in.

page73.title: Kali
page73.description: A young wife hopes to convince her husband to change his short-tempered attitude toward life, but an incident on a remote highway may finally decide the matter.

page73.title: Salalah Mobiles
page73.description: The film is a beautiful love tale which takes place between a mobile shop owner and a girl who is a regular to the shop. The film is a fun film which shows the attempts of the boy to find the whereabouts of the girl and to woo her.

page73.title: Vasanthathinte Kanal Vazhikalil
page73.description: The film directed by Anil V Nagendra is a story about the political history of God's own country- Kerala. It reiterates the story of patrons like Ak Gopalan, EMS Namboothiripad and Krishna Pillai.

page73.title: Puthiya Niyamam
page73.description: The story unfolds the life of family court lawyer Adv. Louis Pothen and his wife and dancer Vasuki. An unexpected problem affects the whole family and the consequent efforts of Louis to solve the issue forms the rest of the plot.

page73.title: Action Hero Biju
page73.description: The life of an honest and determined police officer Biju and the various criminals he puts behind bars.

page74.title: Maalgudi Days
page74.description: The movie is set in the backdrop of an imaginary school named Malgudi Residential School. The movie revolves around a mysterious man Zephan Solomon(Anoop Menon) and two students of this school.

page74.title: Two Countries
page74.description: Ullas from India moves to Canada with Laya who follows Canadian customs and language which he finds difficult to digest. The resulting humorous incidents in the life of Ullas and Laya forms the plot.

page74.title: Hello Namasthe
page74.description: When Madhav and Jerrin, who lived together till then, bought two adjacent villas and started living with their family, they never thought that their friendship will be affected in any ways.

page74.title: Paavada
page74.description: Joy a young man who leads a carefree life. Joy acquaintance Babu Joseph, an English professor, and they reminiscence some seemingly forgotten memories.

page74.title: Charlie
page74.description: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

page74.title: Adi Kapyare Kootamani
page74.description: The story revolves around a bunch of college students when a young woman gets stuck inside the boys' hostel with no way out.

page75.title: Kanal
page75.description: The film revolves around two families hailing from the South Indian state of Kerala who has spent some important years of their lives in the Middle East.

page75.title: Style
page75.description: Tom (Unni Mukundan), a car mechanic, leads a happy life with his parents. Tom and his brother Jerry (Master Elhan) have an age difference of 15 years. He falls in love with a girl and in the mean time a stranger, Edgar (Tovino Thomas) enters their life.

page75.title: Ennu Ninte Moideen
page75.description: Based on the real life love story of Moideen and Kanchanamala, which happened in 1960s in the backdrop of Calicut.

page75.title: Lukka Chuppi
page75.description: The film exhibits a get together of a group of friends after a long interval of 14 years. They discuss their naughty works, silly love stories, etc that happened during their college life with their life partners.

page75.title: Kaliyachan
page75.description: The only way to become a great Kathakali dancer is to follow your master. Individual excellence is nothing compared to the devotion to the Master, which the protagonist learns too late in life.

page75.title: Anarkali
page75.description: The story of a Naval officer who falls in love with the gorgeous daughter of a harsh and disapproving Vice Admiral.

page76.title: Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi
page76.description: Film features the story of a group of people and their adventures to protect a village which is under exploitation by trade groups

page76.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
page76.description: Amar, Akbar, and Anthony are close friends living in Kochi. They enjoy a carefree life. Their perceptions and beliefs get shattered with an unexpected event and the resulting story forms the plot of the movie.

page76.title: Su.. Su... Sudhi Vathmeekam
page76.description: The movie narrates the story of Sudhi from age 4 to 40 who has a stuttering problem.Su Su Sudhi Vathmeekam is a feel good family entertainer inspired from a real life story.

page76.title: Bangkok Summer
page76.description: The film tells the story Shrihari who, in search of his brother Madavan make it to Bangkok. In the middle of this search, Shrihari had to face lots of problems and struggles.

page76.title: Mumbai Taxi
page76.description: The film is about how a set of officials try to deal with a bomb threat happens in a single day in the city of Mumbai.

page76.title: Decent Parties
page76.description: A photographer dreams of breaking into the film business, but has to put this on hold after an employee error scuttles the impending marriage of a girl. To do the honorable thing he gets married to the girl, but they have different outlooks on life.

page77.title: Ninnishtam Ennishtam 2
page77.description: The film is a sequel to Ninnishtam Ennishtam and the story takes place 25 years from where the first film finished.Sreekuttan nephew arrives in the city where his uncle had lived twenty-five years ago and meet a blind singer.

page77.title: Loham
page77.description: A gold-smuggle deal goes awry, and an array of characters becomes involved.

page77.title: Arjunan Saakshi
page77.description: Roy Mathew is mistaken to be Arjunan, the only witness of the scandalous murder of Firoz Mooppan. With people out to kill him, Roy takes the identity of Arjunan in hopes of bringing Firoz to justice.

page77.title: Uppukandam Brothers Back In Action
page77.description: The sequel to the yesteryear box-office hit, Uppukandam Brothers has the members of the Uppukandam family led by Bobby in a feud with Srambikkal Sathyanesan and also with the son of an old rival, Ettuveettil Ganeshan.

page77.title: Tournament Play And Replay
page77.description: Tournament is a road movie in which the story progresses as the main characters embark on a journey. Viswam, Usman, Balu, Bobby, Chilambu and Subu start from Kochi for a Cricket match selection. Lekshmi, their friend, also joins them.

page77.title: Masters
page77.description: Masters is an action thriller starring Prithviraj in the role of Sreeramakrishnan, who is the Assistant Superintendent of Police.

page78.title: Chaverpada
page78.description: Chaverpada tells the story of a group of engineering college students who have developed a means of their own to voice their protests against the ills that have gripped today's society.

page78.title: 8th March
page78.description: The central question of this film is whether the perpetrators of gender violence will get their comeuppance.

page78.title: Rockstar (Malayalam)
page78.description: Ananth is very passionate about music in his life. Quite unexpectedly, in one of his music trips, he comes across fashion stylist Athira. They have varied perspective, attitude, and vision about life.

page78.title: Akasathinte Niram
page78.description: A 60-year-old man lives on an isolated island. He visits the nearby harbor in a motor boat once a month to sell handicrafts. A young burglar keeps tabs on him and one day jumps onto the motor boat and demands money.

page78.title: Climax
page78.description: An actress gains popularity thanks to her sensuous roles in South Indian films which leads both a rich benefactor and his teenage son to become smitten with her.

page78.title: Big B
page78.description: A mob bodyguard (Mammootty) returns to his hometown and finds many changes.Four brothers hunt for the killer and the truth behind their loving foster mother who was murdered in cold blood.

page79.title: Twenty:20
page79.description: Devaraja Prathapa Varma, underworld don, and rich businessman, wants payback for his brother's murderers. It was the highest-grossing film in Malayalam cinema until 2014.

page79.title: 7th Day
page79.description: A suspended crime branch officer gets involved in the investigation of a twisted case after he suspects a group of 5 friends of weird behavior.

page79.title: Veeralipattu
page79.description: Hari(Pritviraj) is a young man employed in Chennai and is in love with Pooja (Padmapriya), a rich girl. But Hari is haunted by his family traditions and wants to go back to his village in Kerala.

page79.title: Urumi (Malayalam)
page79.description: Chirakkal Kelu Nayanar, a warrior in 16th century Kerala wants to avenge his father killed in a confrontation with Vasco da Gama and his troops and is assisted by his best friend Vavvali and warrior princess Ayesha.

page79.title: Thank You
page79.description: The film is shown to be a reflection of the current socio-political system, based on the violence against women.It revolves around a person who arrives in Trivandrum city who takes a ride from place to place in an Autorickshaw.

page79.title: Immanuel
page79.description: Immanuel works for a publishing house that is counting its days. The publishing house is owned by Joseph, whom Immanuel treats like his father.Debts force Joseph to leave behind his business.

page80.title: Salt Mango Tree
page80.description: The struggles of a middle-class couple to admit their 4-year old kid into a reputed school, which involves huge monetary donations, parent interviews, and other activities.

page80.title: Loka Samastha
page80.description: Gayathri joins a housing colony as a paying guest, meets with her college friend Anoop who desires to marry his lover and fly off to the United States. Gayathri befriends Sarath and lands a job at his ad agency using his help and also falls in love with him.

page80.title: CR No: 89
page80.description: The movie is about the moral dilemmas that individuals commonly face and the various reactions they elicit.

page80.title: Rudra Simhasanam
page80.description: Suresh Gopi's character name in this film is Rudra Simhan who is a yogi who gave up all worldly pleasures by listening to the call of his soul. When he comes back to his homeland after a long journey he comes into the life of Haimavathi.

page80.title: Life Of Josutty
page80.description: The life of a simple village boy, his first broken childhood relationship and his ridiculous adventures in New Zealand after getting marriage.

page80.title: Urumbukal Urangarilla
page80.description: Keluvaasan is a retired master thief. Once, he found a potential young thief, and he entrusted him to his dearest discipline, Benny, to improve more in a theft.

page81.title: Nagara Varidhi Naduvil Njan
page81.description: The movie shows the life of Venu, who is a victim of treachery by his own family members. Venu's only aim in life is to get an MBBS admission for his daughter.

page81.title: Alif
page81.description: The four generations of women in the film are identical sufferers, and when two of them rise in revolt, it speaks for millions of women out there, from all castes and creeds, who will be subjected to a lifetime of desolation and gloom.

page81.title: Ottamandaram
page81.description: Ottamandaram is a social drama movie directed by Vinod Mankara. Bhama plays the role of 14-year-old teenage girl, reportedly movie is based on a real incident which showcases teenage pregnancy and motherhood.

page81.title: Call Me @
page81.description: Call Me is a Malayalam drama movie, directed by Francis Thanikkal. The cast of Call Me includes Arjun Nandakumar,Mallika.

page81.title: The Reporter
page81.description: Eby Mathew was engaged to Sara, who falls prey to one of the most brutal cases of rape and subsequent homicide. The fate of Sara would have been different if the other passengers of the same train were not so ignorant to the glimpses of the unusual.

page81.title: Seconds
page81.description: Jayasurya is an insurance agent who finds it hard to meet his targets. After visiting a psychiatrist for some useful tips on effective communication, he is in the flat to visit Sankar Ramakrishnan, a politician who is trying his luck in elections.

page82.title: Uthara Chemmeen
page82.description: "Uthara chemmeen " is a 2015 Malayalam film directed by Benny Asamsa.The story is inspired by the classic Malayalam movie 'Chemmeen', and not a sequel. The film presents certain characters in the movie Chemmeen in a new perspective

page82.title: Papilo Buddha
page82.description: A band of displaced untouchables in Western Ghats of India embraces Buddhism in order to escape from caste oppression.The film was denied censor certification by the Central Board of Film Certification (CBFC).

page82.title: 5 Sundarikal
page82.description: The film is a compilation of 5 stories of 5 woman - a mother, a daughter, a lover, a wife and an actress- each story explores different shades of love.

page82.title: Jilebi
page82.description: Jilebi is the story of a confrontation between villager Sreekuttan and his city-bred nephews. Sreekuttan has his life happily confined to his farm and his pet crops. Far away, in Dubai, there is a family crisis and he is forced to take responsibility of them.

page82.title: Pranchiyettan & the Saint
page82.description: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

page82.title: Rasam
page82.description: Menon decides to have a grand traditional Kerala sadya for his daughter's marriage. During the days of marriage arrangements, some unexpected events happened and the rest is plotted in the movie.

page83.title: Love 24x7
page83.description: `Love 24x7` is a love story set in the backdrop of media. The movie showcases many interesting facts about media.

page83.title: Savithriyude Aranjanam
page83.description: Ramunni is a local patriarch who helps out the needy by lending them money. Neelakanatan, a local lad, borrows some money from Ramunni by pledging his wife Savithri's golden Aranjaanam (waistband).

page83.title: Nirnnayakam
page83.description: Nirnayakam is a strong family drama dealing with a major social issue, shot at the National Defense Academy Pune, Mysore, and Cochin. It is the story of a young man and the bond he shares with his parents.

page83.title: Kanthari
page83.description: 'Kanthari' is a movie which takes a peek at certain social issues and the film focuses on individuals who are not accepted by the mainstream society.

page83.title: Sahasram
page83.description: A murder is conspired on the sets of a film, IPS Sahasramam is appointed in charge to investigate the murder.

page83.title: Angels
page83.description: The movie tells the story of a brilliant yet egoistic police officer named Hameem Haider. During an important investigation, he is sidetracked by external forces to keep him off the case. A priest and a journalist then enter his life.

page84.title: Gajapokiri
page84.description: Malayalam Dubbed Version of  2012 Telugu Movie Julai.A hilarious cat and mouse chase and mind game between two highly intelligent young men, who stands on the two sides of law and order.

page84.title: Romans
page84.description: Two escaped convicts arrive at a remote village in Kerala near the border with Tamil Nadu. Villages mistake them as Catholic priests sent from Rome to reopen their long closed church.

page84.title: Madirasi
page84.description: The film tells the story of Jayaram, a widower from a village in Kerala. Meera Nandan, who is a teacher, wants to get married to Jayaram and be a mother to his son, whom she likes a lot. The story begins with a young chap getting kidnapped.

page84.title: Rajaneegandhi
page84.description: Rajaneegandhi is a 1980 Indian Malayalam film, directed by M. Krishnan Nair and produced by NG John. The film stars Madhu, Lakshmi, Adoor Bhasi and Jose in lead roles. The film had musical score by G. Devarajan.

page84.title: Oruvan
page84.description: A village is gripped with fear after a psychopath escapes from a mental hospital where he was in police custody.

page84.title: Pappi Appacha
page84.description: Pappy Appacha is a father-son comedy flick.The father-son duo is also thick buddies who take care of the family business. But when the son falls in love with the teacher, things change.

page85.title: Nayakan
page85.description: A docile Kathakali artist loses his father and sister and sets out to seek revenge on the criminal responsible for their deaths.

page85.title: Mullassery Madhavan
page85.description: Madhavan Kutty leads a comfortable life with his wife Seetha and his daughter. He has a decent job in a government office and is a man who seems at peace with himself. A random tiff with an ex-school mate makes Madhavan Kutty do the unthinkable.

page85.title: Actually
page85.description: Actually, the Malayalam movie centers around two different incidents. It develops through a group of Characters, who in varied ways get involved in these incidents.

page85.title: Double Barrel
page85.description: A group of gangsters set out in search of two diamonds named "Laila and Majnu", which are worth only when they a together.

page85.title: Vishwasam... Athallae Ellaam
page85.description: This is the story of a happy-go-lucky college student and his strict police commissioner father. The film chronicles the coming-of-age of the wastrel son, who realizes there are no shortcuts to success.

page85.title: She Taxi
page85.description: A movie which portrays the role of women in fields men dominate, the movie emphasizes on the woman as taxi drivers.

page86.title: Utopiayile Rajavu
page86.description: Swathanthran is an innocent and honest young man from the village named Kokrangara. The movie depicts the current social and political scenarios of Kerala in a humorous way.

page86.title: Bhaskar The Rascal
page86.description: Businessman Bhaskaran Pillai builds a large commercial empire until his wife dies. Under pressure from his son, Bhaskaran goes on a trip where he meets Hima, a small-business owner.

page86.title: Kunjiramayanam
page86.description: Kunjiraman (Vineeth) lives in a remote, old world village in Kerala named Desam, surrounded by greenery, myths, and legends.

page86.title: Aazhakadal
page86.description: Azhakadal means deep sea and the film has the sea as its backdrop, with Kalabhavan Mani playing the role of a fisherman.

page86.title: Appavum Veenjum
page86.description: The movie is basically about the equation that a young musician has with a middle-aged couple. Sunny Wayne essays the role of the musician who comes across as a passionate and intense young man with his rugged looks and brooding silence.

page87.title: Aamayum Muyalum
page87.description: Aamayum Muyalum is the story of a village on the banks of a river and its people. The film is about a love, a death, a big secret and the villagers who are chasing a lot of money.

page87.title: Vellimoonga
page87.description: A happy go lucky politician is smitten by a girl half his age and tries his luck winning her hand.

page87.title: Mili
page87.description: A story of Mili, an introvert girl who grows up to be a self-made woman.

page87.title: Saaradhi
page87.description: An easy going ambulance driver gets a call to drive a dead body and the mourning relatives to a place that is far away. On the way he realizes that it is not exactly what is happening. He decides to run away from it. But can he?

page87.title: Baahubali: The Beginning (Malayalam)
page87.description: Amarendra Baahubali is the common man`s savior. The people of his town worship him like they worship god. His son, Shivudu unknowingly becomes their hero. His return to the village is the beginning of a fight against the evil.

page87.title: Madhura Naranga
page87.description: This is a beautiful love story set in the Gulf and Sri Lanka. The social life, employment facilities, and the legal procedures in the Gulf countries are all analyzed in the film.

page88.title: Money Ratnam
page88.description: Neil comes across an unexpected incident, while returning after the New Year party. He tries to escape from the scene by getting into a bus where he gets a bag containing money left by someone else.

page88.title: Chandrettan Evideya
page88.description: Chandrettan Evideya is a family entertainer which revolves around a nuclear family and married life. Dileep essays the title character Chandrettan, who struggles to cope with his dominant wife, played by Anusree.

page88.title: Thattathin Marayathu
page88.description: Thattathin Marayathu is a college romance. It's the story of a boy and a girl belonging to different communities falling in love and the conflict arising out of this.

page88.title: Sapthamashree Thaskaraha
page88.description: A group of seven people, including both con men and common men, plan a small heist with a big reward.

page88.title: Premam
page88.description: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

page88.title: Acha Dhin
page88.description: Set in the backdrop of God's own country, Kerala, Acha Din is the story of a family from Jharkhand who is now settled in Ernakulam, the buzzing business hub of Kerala.

page89.title: Lavender
page89.description: A tragic love triangle involving a young painter, an Interpol detective, and a professional hit-man.

page89.title: Oru Second Class Yathra
page89.description: Two Police Constables with a prisoner in search of an escaped prisoner while conveying from Kannur to Trivandrum.

page89.title: Sir C. P.
page89.description: Sir CP tells the story of Chethimutttathu Philip (Jayaram) who runs a college that offers to lend academic help to any laidback student in distress

page89.title: Ivide
page89.description: A police officer (Prithviraj Sukumaran) investigates a series of killings involving IT professionals in Atlanta. He develops a rapport with the CEO (Nivin Pauly) of an IT company and the two join minds to stop the spree.

page89.title: 32aam Adhyaayam 23aam Vaakyam
page89.description: A book gifted to a couple engraves "23" in the husband's (Freddy) mind and he starts seeing it everywhere. When he discovers a striking similarity of the story with people in his life, he starts investigating.

page89.title: Swargathekkal Sundaram
page89.description: Swargathekkal Sundaram is about two close friends, who enter into a joint business which flourishes. An incident happens in one`s life, following which everything goes haywire. The bond between the two friends is the central thread of the film.

page90.title: Oru Vadakkan Selfie
page90.description: An impulsive photograph taken on a train starts a chain of misadventures for a failing student and a nave young woman from his village.

page90.title: Chirakodinja Kinavukal
page90.description: After 18 years, Ambujakshan decides to make hear his 'Thayyalkaran-Sumathi' love story to a director and producer after amending and modifying it, in order to make it a 'New Generation Film'.

page90.title: Kumbasaram
page90.description: Alby is an autorickshaw driver and is wife is Meera. They pin all their hopes on their only son Jerry. The movie narrates the deep friendship shared between Jerry's friends and the unexpected events in the life of Alby.

page90.title: Ennum Eppozhum
page90.description: Journalist Vineeth M Pillai's carefree nature does not go down well with his colleagues or new boss. Taking a comprehensive interview of advocate Deepa, an overnight celebrity, is his chance to set his image right.

page90.title: You Too Brutus
page90.description: The story revolves around the paradoxical elements of love and betrayal which leads to bizarre endings. The film is filled with sub-plots and ends with the beginning of possible subplots.

page90.title: Village Guys
page90.description: The film tells the story of four young men, who have been troubling people from their village for a while with their antics. When Sudhi returns to the village with a girl in tow, trouble starts brewing in their paradise.

page91.title: Pakida
page91.description: Aadi meets a mysterious and concealing traveler George Koshy Anthrapper and travels with him from Kochi to Madurai. On their way, they come across Sunny and Kani who change their lives.

page91.title: Oru Korean Padam
page91.description: Under pressure from his girlfriend to debut as a filmmaker, Kishore accepts a brilliant script from a stranger and directs a movie. While its release brings him recognition and good luck, he is also accused of plagiarism.

page91.title: Onnum Loka Mahayudham
page91.description: All that the unethical Dr Jacob cares about is making money through shady medical deals. Unfortunately, his final deal goes haywire and cops chase him in mufti to trace the network involved.

page91.title: Namasthe Bali Island
page91.description: A woman gets cheated by a man after their arranged engagement. The woman finds that the man had traveled to Bali and sets off to it.

page91.title: Munnariyippu
page91.description: Anjali, a freelance journalist meets C.K. Raghavan, an interesting inmate who's outstaying his sentence in jail for a crime he says he didn't commit. His vastly different views peak her interest and she documents his life and happenings.

page91.title: Mathai Kuzhappakkaranalla
page91.description: Mathai (Jayasurya), a native of Thrissur, is an auto driver. He is very innocent and is always ready to help others in their needs. He interferes in the matters of others necessarily and unnecessarily with the intention to help them.

page92.title: Kalyanism
page92.description: Kalyanism is the story of a Malayalee family trapped in another country due to legal issues. When her husband gets arrested by the police, Kalyani (Ananya) takes up the responsibilities of her family.

page92.title: Ivan Maryadaraman
page92.description: This is the official remake of the Telugu hit - Maryada Ramanna. It is the story of a man who returns to his village to claim his ancestral land. Along the way, he meets and befriends a charming young woman.

page92.title: Aadu
page92.description: Shaji paapan and his friends get a goat as the prize for their tug of war competition. Experience the stories with the goat 'pinky'.

page92.title: 100 Degrees Celsius
page92.description: Based on real-life incidents, 100 Degree Celsius revolves around the lives of 5 women. A housewife, a banker, an IT professional, a TV reporter and a college student.The movie takes a turn when the lives of all the 5 women turn upside down.

page92.title: 100 Days Of Love
page92.description: A man, who just got dumped, falls in love with another girl who he bullied in his childhood.

page92.title: Varsham
page92.description: Varsham tells the story of a man who returns home from the Gulf to start his own finance firm. He has a wife and son, and loves them very much. But after his business begins to flourish, his competitors team up against him.

page93.title: Tamaar Padaar
page93.description: Tubelight Mani and Jumper Thambi, two harmless, self-employed circus performers, gets misunderstood as two terrorists by ACP Pouran. He later understands the truth and now wants them released at all costs.

page93.title: Run Baby Run
page93.description: The film which has news media as the backdrop, traces the relationship between two people and their professional conflicts.

page93.title: Picket 43
page93.description: The film dealt with the story of an Indian army officer guarding a picket alone in Kashmir and his friendship with a Pakistani soldier.

page93.title: Peruchazhi
page93.description: The film is about how Jagannathan a young politician from India ends up being the chief political adviser to the California state Governor's election campaign and his use of tactics standard of Indian politics to win the election.

page93.title: Ormayundo Ee Mukham
page93.description: The film tells the story of a businessman and an artist who fall in love. On the surface level, the personal and professional issues of the couple create a dent in their life, and the movie follows the subsequent events.

page93.title: Inspector Garud
page93.description: A corrupt police officer takes bribes to make up the amount that he paid to get the job. He marries a woman to avenge his humiliation. Later, he has a change of heart and starts his life afresh.

page94.title: Haram
page94.description: Balu realizes that the helping hand that he offers to Isha, a colleague in distress, ended up in marriage. The initial euphoria over, as the couple settles down to a comfortable life, disagreements start crawling in.

page94.title: Fireman
page94.description: The leakage of a massive LPG tank causes a group of brave firemen, police and local people to put their life on the line when a total city evacuation is impossible because a prison lies in the radius.

page94.title: Ellam Chettante Ishtam Pole
page94.description: Kuttiyettan works in a bank, and amply makes use of his free time to write letters to those in power to see to it that justice is served to the needy. His wife is an epitome of patience and believes in the god wife's dictum.

page94.title: Cousins
page94.description: Sam is stuck somewhere in the past, courtesy a mishap that occurred six years back, that had almost cost him his life. The psychiatrist suggests that he goes on a trip to Manipal where he was when the tragedy took place.

page94.title: Kelkkaatha Sabdham
page94.description: The story revolves around Bhanu (Padmapriya) who gets married to Rathnavel Kalidas (Nithin Sathya), a guy who works in railways as a Hockey Player. He married Bhanu, by hiding the facts that he is impotent and is a recovering alcoholic.

page94.title: Vaadhyar
page94.description: The film centers around Anoop Krishnan (Jayasurya) who wants to study Business Administration but lands up with a B.Ed. He begins teaching at Kottapuram Saraswathi Vilasam U P School under Subhadra( Menaka), the headmistress.

page95.title: Roudram
page95.description: A dedicated police officer investigates the death of a drug baron in spite of pressures from above and corruption within his police force.

page95.title: China Town
page95.description: A man runs a casino with his friends and shares the profits with them. A gangster, who owns several casinos, comes to know of their enterprise and intervenes, disrupting their lives.

page95.title: August 15
page95.description: When the Chief Minister of Kerala V. G. Sadanandan, popularly known as VG, is poisoned, the investigation is assigned to ace cop Perumal. He has to apprehend the criminal who is a master of disguises and is known not to leave any witnesses.

page95.title: Naran
page95.description: Velayudhan is a good hearted drunkard local rowdy that lives in Mullankoli village. Gopinathan tries to ruin his life and does evil things to the village. Velayudhan has to get rid of him.

page95.title: Kurukshetra
page95.description: The story revolves around the 1999 Kargil War between India and Pakistan.In the Kargil war of 1999, an Indian commander faces off against his Pakistani counterpart.

page95.title: Ardhanaari
page95.description: Vinayan is a transgender who is always at the receiving end of insults and unfair behaviour. His effeminate actions also earn him the ire of his own family. Will Vinayan ignore social norms and stay true to himself?

page96.title: Vamanapuram Bus Route
page96.description: The land of Vamanapuram has no bus route. The conflict between the ruling party and the opposition in the Panchayath prevents any development in the village. The Panchayath President Gopalan wants to tar the roads and get money from that.

page96.title: Sooryan
page96.description: Sooryan tells the story of Sooryanarayanan who is a very popular and accomplished singer. One day, while Sooryanarayanan is on a hospital visit with his niece, he sees someone who sends the shivers down his spine.

page96.title: One Way Ticket
page96.description: Kunjappu is a jeep-driver who is a die-hard fan of Mammootty. His family want to see Kunjappu married and so a marriage-broker named Beeran is behind him in finding a match for Kunjappu.

page96.title: Mr. Brahmachari
page96.description: Ananthan Thampy (Mohanlal) is a middle-aged man who has decided never to marry in his life. He thinks he will lose all his youthfulness and manly looks by marriage. His main hobby is body building and physique maintaining.

page96.title: Krithyam
page96.description: Sandra Punnoose (Pavithra akka Parul Yadav) discovers that she has six months to live. She hires a hitman to end her life, but then finds out her condition is curable.

page96.title: Annan Thambi
page96.description: Annan Thambi is the story of twin brothers, Appu and Achu.Appu is a talkative conman who always finds himself in trouble. While Achu, a mute, is nicer than his brother, he draws a dagger on Appu due to misunderstandings created by the villain.

page97.title: Mylanchi Monchulla Veedu
page97.description: Sahib is head of an aristocratic Muslim Family. Kasim is his son. Vahida, Kasim's daughter elopes with her lover Madhavan Kutty on the eve of her wedding. That leads to a lot of ruckus including the killing of the son of a Hindu leader.

page97.title: Villali Veeran
page97.description: Siddharthan (Dileep) is a noble-hearted merchant who is burdened with lot of responsibilities in his life. His pursuit for money lands him in trouble and the film traces as to how he deals with his adversaries.

page97.title: Praise The Lord
page97.description: Praise the Lord is an adaptation of Zacharia`s short story of the same name. Joy is an immensely rich farmer based in Pala. He is not aware of the life beyond his small town in Pala as he has not got an opportunity to explore the outside world.

page97.title: Life
page97.description: Sudhi has the perfect family that anyone could dream of, and Meenakshi is more than the perfect wife. The couple has a son, and when Meenakshi invites a highly meritorious, but poor student Leah to live with them, trouble brews in their heaven.

page97.title: Ladies And Gentlemen
page97.description: The Story Is About Four Ladies, Whose Lives Evolve By The Influence Of One Man!!The film is set against on Kerala`s IT industry.
The story of Rameshan who has a huge craze for Cricket, and his final attempt to realize his cricket dream through his son.

page98.title: Namboothiri Yuvavu At 43
page98.description: Jayanthan works as a priest at a local temple and has almost given up on his plans to get married. Which is why he is taken by surprise when Sangeetha, an 18-year-old girl expresses her willingness to spend the rest of her life with him.

page98.title: Laptop
page98.description: Ravi a world-renowned artist in Calcutta who wants to reunite with his mother but is guilty about the way he feels about her.

page98.title: Buddy
page98.description: The film is about 5 friends who live in a house together in Ooty. It is when yet another new found friend joins them that the fun begins. But this new friend has some hidden motives behind coming together with these five buddies.

page98.title: 101 Chodyangal
page98.description: Story of a 12 year old boy given a task of framing 101 questions by his teacher- without worrying about the answers. The plot moves around his life and the questions - that are intertwined together.

page98.title: Sagar Alias Jacky Reloaded
page98.description: Sagar Alias Jacky is about a dreaded don (Mohanlal) who is forced to come to India because of an impending case, where he meets old foes. Meanwhile, a news reporter (Bhavana) tries to expose him but fails when she falls in love with him.

page98.title: Pulliman
page98.description: Kunjunni is a youngster in a village who is loved by all. Radha belongs to a nadodi gang, who has come to the village to sell statuettes of Lord Krishna. Kunjunni and Radha are in love. Radha's father forbids her to marry the orphan.

page99.title: Nanma
page99.description: Nanma takes us into the world of Muthu Chettiar, who fishes out dead bodies from ponds, muddy waters, marshy areas etc and sees it as his profession and is never ashamed of doing what he has been doing all along.

page99.title: Lollypop
page99.description: Franco, who runs a motor garage is a nice guy but is hard on his deputies. His sister is his only weakness.Franco falls in love with the enemy of his sister

page99.title: Kana Kanmani
page99.description: Roy is a successful architect married to Maya with a daughter named Anakha. Roy decides to take his family on a vacation to Singapore, but Anu insists that they first go to Roy's old home. But upon arriving at the old house, Anu starts behaving strangely.

page99.title: Apoorva
page99.description: Apoorva is presented as the narration by a small boy of the happenings that take place in his school. This movie is known for debut directorial venture of a 17 year old director.

page99.title: Second Show
page99.description: Lalu is willing to do anything for money, even if he has to get involved in the drug trade.

page99.title: Rose Guitarinaal
page99.description: Thara, a trainee with an airline falls in love with Shyam, the CEO of her company. Joe, a sales executive at a bank and her childhood friend, loves her as well without she ever knowing about it.

page100.title: Mulla
page100.description: Lachi is a hard-working 19-year-old who supports her family after her father's mysterious death. While she was traveling on a train, Mulla and his gang enter. They argue over silly issues, and he discovers a baby in a bag on the train.

page100.title: Magic Lamp
page100.description: Anupama gets a photo of a person while traveling. She wanted to become an air hostesses but her family has a tradition that the woman in their family will not work and she should get married to one of her 'mora cherakan' (fiancs).

page100.title: IG Inspector General
page100.description: I.G. Durga Prasad is the head of Traffic Police. One day during his duty time he takes into custody a gang of criminals who involved in hawala transactions. Chief Minister calls a meeting to ascertain the source of the money.

page100.title: De Ingottu Nokkiye
page100.description: The film is about Vettikadu Sivan (Jayasurya), a young, intelligent man who sets out on a mission to settle a score and give a peace of mind to his uncle Vettikadu Sadasivan (Jagathy Sreekumar) who is the chief minister of the state.

page100.title: Cycle
page100.description: The story is about two friends Roy and Sanju. Roy is a cashier in a small private bank and Sanju works as a salesman in an electronic goods shop in the same complex. A need of big money arises when they get into a mess.

page100.title: Positive
page100.description: Raju is a musician engineer who runs a band with three of his bosom pals. A chance encounter with Jyothi soon leads to a short-lived romance. Raju is totally devastated when Jyothi disappears without a trace.

page101.title: Polytechnic
page101.description: Pauly (Kunchacko Boban) leads an easy life as a politician in his village. As he belongs to a well-to-do family, he does not have to earn anything. Instead, all his activities are for the welfare of his village.

page101.title: Neramm
page101.description: Mathew (Nivin Pauly) clashes with Jeena's (Nazriya Nazim) father and a money lender when he cannot find a job.Can a young man escape from the clutches of a loan shark on time?

page101.title: Vikramadithyan
page101.description: The lives of two boys - one the son of a cop and the other the son of a thief.

page101.title: Vegam
page101.description: Two boys attempt to lead a luxurious life but end up getting into a lot of trouble.

page101.title: Lucky The Racer (Malayalam Dubbed)
page101.description: A pair of brothers grow up hating each other, much to the upset of their mother.(Malayalam Dubbed Version of 2014 Telugu Movie Race Gurram)

page101.title: Parunthu
page101.description: Blade Purushottaman (Mammootty), nicknamed Parunthu Purushu for the way he preys on his targets, is a heartless financier. His rude and insulting ways of talking to people who owe him money have hurt many people

page102.title: Manglish
page102.description: A fish auctioneer's life changes after meeting a mysterious Jewish girl and his struggle to communicate with her in English.

page102.title: Day Night Game
page102.description: Day Night Game is a Malayalam comedy drama film directed by Shibu Prabhakar, starring Maqbool Salmaan, Archana Kavi and Bhagath Manuel.

page102.title: Chewing Gum
page102.description: An encounter with a city girl broadens a country guy's horizons.Chewing Gum Malayalam Movie Starring: Sunny Wayne, Thinkal Bhal. Directed By: Praveen M Sukumaran.

page102.title: Bhramaram
page102.description: A share broker gets a little apprehensive when a stranger, who claims to be his friend, starts living in his house. He soon discovers that the stranger intends to exact revenge after being framed for a murder he didn't commit.

page102.title: SMS
page102.description: SMS is an investigation film of the death of a college girl. The prime suspect is her lover itself. The question is, whether he is the killer.

page102.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
page102.description: A man who is a teacher by day robs a particular bank at night. Unimpressed with the way the police are investigating the case, the bank manager decides to hire a detective to nab the criminal.

page103.title: Love In Singapore
page103.description: Machu (Mammootty) was cheated by an Anglo-Indian (Nedumudi Venu) by promising him to marry their daughter. They escapes to Singapore and the plot forms when Machu also flies to Singapore to find out them.

page103.title: Calcutta News
page103.description: An investigative journalist (Dilip) probes the murder of a man who worked for sex traders.

page103.title: How Old Are You
page103.description: A lady rediscovers her lost charisma for the good of the society overcoming strong odds from a patriarchal society.

page103.title: Bangalore Days
page103.description: Three cousins (Dulquer Salmaan, Nivin Pauly, Nazriya Nazim) set out to fulfill their dreams.

page103.title: Mosayile Kuthira Meenukal
page103.description: An unusual friendship between two escaped convicts is formed during a cat and mouse chase, which leads them to the beautiful islands of Lakshadweep.

page103.title: God's Own Country
page103.description: Manu travels from Dubai to Kochi to attain his goal. He is helped by Abhirami, whose confidence and courage makes his task easier. Public prosecutor Mathew Tharakan and taxi driver Muhammed have their own intentions to be pursued as well.

page104.title: Flat No. 4B
page104.description: The film is a story of a middle-class conservative family. The film shows how a householder loses his job and has to work as a security guard of a flat. His children have colorful dreams especially his elder daughter Revathi.

page104.title: Onnum Mindathe
page104.description: Agricultural officer Sachithanandan and his wife Shyama's life changes after his friend Jose visits to stay with them for few days.

page104.title: Law Point
page104.description: Sathya is a leading criminal advocate after successfully wins a rape case against the victim Sainnaba he is now consulted to handle a compromising situation regarding the suicide attempt of Maya.

page104.title: The Last Supper
page104.description: Alby (Unni Mukundan), a computer hacker in the police department, Imran Khan (Sreenath Bhasi), a cinematographer, and Berly (Berly), a channel producer, go on an adventurous journey to a strange and mysterious place.

page104.title: Mr. Fraud
page104.description: A prominent person from Delhi reach a palace,which is well known for its tradition and royalty to solve an issue. Consequently, instead of a solution, the issue becomes more and more complicated.

page104.title: One By Two (Malayalam)
page104.description: The film follows a cop who chances upon an accident which kills a man and he embarks on a journey to find certain answers related to that accident victim.

page105.title: Ring Master
page105.description: Prince is a dog trainer who adopts a puppy and named her Diana. The dog begins to act in films and becomes famous. Then, the canine star features in a film alongside Diana, an actress with whom Prince has a past.

page105.title: Mannar Mathai Speaking 2
page105.description: The film is a sequel to the 1995 cult comedy classic, Mannar Mathai Speaking and the third installment in the celebrated Ramji Rao franchise. Mannar Mathai has started a travel agency but he retains his love for theater.

page105.title: Ohm Shanthi Oshaana
page105.description: A spirited young girl would stop at nothing to get the first love of her life, even if it takes seven years and several heartbreaks.

page105.title: Balyakalasakhi
page105.description: Balyakalasakhi is a 2014 Malayalam romantic musical drama film written and directed by debutant Pramod Payyannur based on the 1944 novel of the same name by Vaikom Muhammad Basheer.

page105.title: Nadodi Mannan
page105.description: Padmanabhan is a youth who earns by participating in any protest by any political party. After a work in Trivandrum, he became a popular figure there and became the Mayor of Trivandrum.

page105.title: North 24 Kaatham
page105.description: Kaatham is a unit of measurement and amounts to 16 kilometers. The film revolves around a road trip of three leads of the film and how does this trip change their life.

page106.title: Drishyam
page106.description: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

page106.title: London Bridge
page106.description: London Bridge narrates the importance of relationships, and shows how love and empathy prevail against ambition and dreams.A greedy man falls in love with two women and then chooses the helpless one because he has sympathy for her.

page106.title: Silence
page106.description: Aravind, a vibrant lawyer is all set to take office as a judge. The celebrations are on in full swing when Aravind starts receiving phone calls from a stalker, who seems to know everything about him.

page106.title: Weeping Boy
page106.description: The film is touted to be a comedy thriller which revolves around the character named Sahadevan who is a veterinary doctor.The character usually breaks down into tears on simple issues of life.

page106.title: Bicycle Thieves
page106.description: Losing his dad and mom at an early age, Kunchako (Asif Ali) lives with his relatives who dislikes him. Fed up with the life there, Kunchako leaves his home after stealing their bicycle.

page106.title: Punyalan Agarbattis
page106.description: Joy is ambitious yet rooted in his culture and traditions and believes that there can be no place as beautiful as his hometown.Joy has come up with many businesses, he has seen failures but now wishes to re-emerge with a new venture.

page107.title: Escape From Uganda
page107.description: A woman gets framed for a crime that she didn't commit. And it is up to her husband to save her from the notorious Uganadan prison.

page107.title: Oru Indian Pranayakatha
page107.description: Aymanam Sidharthan is a local politician who hopes to become big some time in his life, but faces some setbacks in his political career. He meets Irene, a Canadian citizen with roots in Kerala.

page107.title: Salaam Kashmir
page107.description: Sreekumar does all the domestic work in his family while his banker wife Suja is the breadwinner. All appears to be smooth until Tommy enters their life bringing back something which Sreekumar wants to run away from.

page107.title: Pullipulikalum Aattinkuttiyum
page107.description: Chakka Gopan is a tourist guide residing in Kuttanadu. He is the sole breadwinner of his family, which consists of his mother Madhavi and three elder brothers.They have many enemies, who take revenge on the helpless Gopan instead.

page107.title: Pattam Pole
page107.description: The film name of the film means ``Like a kite``. It is a love story of two individuals from the same village. Although born and brought up in the village, the girl is very modern in her outlook while the guy is simple living.

page107.title: Nadan
page107.description: Nadan is the story of a popular drama troupe owned by Devadas Sargavedi (Jayaram), which was previously possessed by his father and grandfather in the past, and speaks about the problems faced by the owner and his survival.

page108.title: Ginger
page108.description: Shaji Kailas`s `Ginger` is a humorous tale, set against the backdrop of a village, enroots a road trip. Two scheming thieves Vivekanandan and Najeeb Kecheri plans to rob Harinarayanan and his wife Devika`s house.

page108.title: Ezhamathe Varavu
page108.description: A wild tiger causes havoc in a remote village and all hope rests on a brave hunter. An archaeologist and old crush of the hunter's wife comes into the mix to further the chaos.

page108.title: Dolls
page108.description: Dolls' is the story of two physicians from two generations. This Malayalam drama also centers around a heritage home, named, Vaidyarmadom. The film stars John and Sruti in pivotal roles.

page108.title: Daivathinte Swantham Cleetus
page108.description: A skit on Jesus Christ brings out a change in good-hearted rowdy Cleetus along with revealing few surprises of his nature and his relationship with a neighborhood tailor.

page108.title: Olipporu
page108.description: The film follows the life of a blogger and his association with people who share his tastes. The bloggers get together to put up an event in Bangalore. The coordinator of this event is a blog writer whose blog Olipporali is very famous.

page108.title: Good Bad And Ugly
page108.description: Three boys come to a big city and find that it changes them in dark ways.Siva, Jeevan, and Anwar reach Thiruvananthapuram with different aims. Meanwhile, these three who are unknown to each other till then get acquainted during a journey.

page109.title: D Company
page109.description: `D Company` is a Malayalam portmanteau film. It is an anthology of five independently shot action films directed by Joshiy, Shaji Kailas, M. Padmakumar, Diphan and Vinod Vijayan.

page109.title: Kadhaveedu
page109.description: The film is an anthology with adaptations of stories written by renowned Malayalam fiction writers Basheer, M. T. Vasudevan Nair and Madhavikutty (Kamala Surayya).

page109.title: Memories
page109.description: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

page109.title: Vishudhan
page109.description: A priest and nun face the consequences of their action against a corrupt businessman.Vishudhan is directed by Vysakh. Kunchacko Boban plays the role of a Christian priest in the film.

page109.title: Vishwaroopam (Malayalam)
page109.description: Nirupama (Pooja Kumar) marries a dance instructor (Kamal Hassan) and she wants to end the marriage after three years to pursue her higher education.(Malayalam Dubbed Version)

page109.title: Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi
page109.description: Kasi and Suni go for the ride from Kerala to Nagaland in search of Kasi's girlfriend. En route, they encounter different people who change their lives forever.

page110.title: Musafir (Malayalam)
page110.description: Musafir is a wanted criminal who enters the life of a rich, beautiful girl and stirs up unprecedented events in her life. How Musafir makes up for his acts form the core of the story.

page110.title: Artist
page110.description: The film is a story of two individuals who aspire to make a name in the world of fine arts. Initially classmates, they soon become live-ins only to realize that both of them have dreams that are far different from reality.

page110.title: Red Wine
page110.description: Ratheesh Vasudevan, Assistant Commissioner of Police, is investigating the murder of Anoop, a part time actor in local plays. Investigation reveals other faces of Anoop, who is a leftist activist and an engineer by qualification.

page110.title: Orissa
page110.description: 'Orissa' is about the trials and tribulations of an Odisha girl named Suneyi and a Malayali constable who falls in love with her. Unni Mukundan essays the role of Chirsthu Das and Sanika Nambiar of 'Olympian' fame plays Suneyi.

page110.title: Mumbai Police
page110.description: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers something.

page110.title: Bharya Athra Pora
page110.description: Satyanathen is a teacher at Vivekodayam school, Thrissur . His wife Priya is a bank employee. They lead a happy life together. Satyanathan has a lot of friends and he leads a somewhat lazy life.

page111.title: Up and Down : Mukalil Oralundu
page111.description: The film revolves around eight people who were stuck in an elevator and mystery of the death of a woman.

page111.title: Hotel California
page111.description: A mix of incidents such as a kidnapping, identity theft, counterfeit DVD exchange, pimping out a TV actress etc happens at the time of the release of a much-awaited movie.

page111.title: Pigman
page111.description: A son of an idealistic political activist is determined to get a doctorate in linguistics. Although mired in poverty, he works hard on his thesis.

page111.title: Honey Bee
page111.description: The story of how two very close friends realize their love for each other, how they elope on her wedding day and the many struggles they face when they fight for survival.

page111.title: Aaru Sundarimaarude Katha
page111.description: Aaru Sundarimarude Katha tells the story of six women whose destinies affect each other as they bond together for their respective families in the face of adversities which includes the murder of one among these.

page111.title: ABCD: American-Born Confused Desi
page111.description: American Born Confused Desi is a comedy film.Two spoilt cousins are sent to India after they get into trouble in America. Once in India, they realize that they have to fend for themselves as their bank account has been blocked.

page112.title: Shikkar
page112.description: A lorry Driver who was a police officer tries to protect his daughter from an unknown man who is hunting them.

page112.title: Cowboy
page112.description: Vinay lives in Kuala Lumpur with his parents. His father is totally against him and his ways. Vinay runs a pub named Cowboy which makes his father comment that he makes a living by shamelessly running a brothel.

page112.title: 101 Wedding
page112.description: 101 Weddings is a humor based story set against the backdrop of a mass marriage ceremony which are taking place together at one platform as part of a mass marriage ceremony.

page112.title: Navagatharkku Swagatham
page112.description: Navagatharkku Swagatham is a Malayalam campus-based film written by Kalavoor Ravikumar and directed by Jayakrishna Karanavar.

page112.title: Jawan Of Vellimala
page112.description: The film revolves around a village called Vellimala, a dam in this village and the people living there. The villagers of Vellimala consider the dam as a sign of their pride.

page112.title: Celluloid
page112.description: The film is based on the life of J C Daniel, the director of Vigathakumaran, the first movie in Malayalam cinema.

page113.title: Akasmikam
page113.description: Siddique is quite perturbed that his wife Swetha Menon is pregnant. Their only son (Ashwin) who is getting ready for the board exams has quite a lot on his mind, besides studies.

page113.title: 10:30 A.M Local Call
page113.description: When a happily married Alby is confronted by his old love for help, things go wrong and a string of serial murders form the rest of the plot.

page113.title: Rebecca Uthup Kizhakkemala
page113.description: Movie narrates the story of an athlete Rebecca whom her village Kizhakkemala is proud of. In an interesting way the movie plots family relationships through the life of Rebecca.

page113.title: Prabhuvinte Makkal
page113.description: The story is about Sidhartha - a man who is rich, intelligent and has everything he could wish for, but one day, he loses interest in everything worldly and embarks on a journey to places like Rishikesh and the Himalayas.

page113.title: Players (malayalam)
page113.description: 'Players' is set in a village whose inhabitants are passionate about biking. The sport is so popular to the extent that parents are willing to get their daughters married to the best biker.

page113.title: Natholi Oru Cheriya Meenalla
page113.description: The story is about a writer, who is the caretaker of a flat and faces some strange and unexpected events in the flat. He starts writing a story based on these strange events and creates some fictional characters in the story as well as around him.

page114.title: Nee Ko Nja Cha
page114.description: Three friends travel to Goa as one of them broke up with his girlfriend. They meet two girls there, become friends, but soon get into trouble.

page114.title: Lokpal
page114.description: The film is about a hotel owner Nanda Gopal, who dons another identity, called Lokpal to confront corruption in society. A vigilante who works against the corruption of the society!!

page114.title: Chettayees
page114.description: The story is set against an eventful New Year celebration of five friends and some incidents that take place in the span of three days or so. This film is directed by Shajoon Kariyal.

page114.title: Bavuttiyude Namathil
page114.description: Mammootty plays Bavutty, a chauffeur in a wealthy household. He is much more than a driver; he is very much part of the family. For Sethu, his employer, life is all about making money, but Bavutty is a simple man with small dreams.

page114.title: Mr. Marumakan
page114.description: Ashok Raj, though a lawyer by profession has indeed dedicated his life to revive the lost glory that the drama troupe Bharatha Kalakshetram has once enjoyed.

page114.title: Proprietors: Kammatha and Kammath
page114.description: A story of two brothers who migrated to Goa from Kochi during the Portuguese invasion. `Kammath & Kammath` depicts the obstacles two brothers face while running their hotel business.

page115.title: Isaac Newton S/O Philipose
page115.description: It narrates the story of the relationship between a father and a son. As expected by every parent, Moorikottukaran Philipose (Nedumudi Venu) and Sara too had their own colorful dreams when a son was born to them.

page115.title: Ayalum Njanum Thammil
page115.description: A story on how a brilliant and dedicated senior doctor molds an irresponsible amateur doctor into one much like him, and how a forbidden relationship comes in between.

page115.title: Arike
page115.description: The film tells the story of Shantanu (Dileep), a Linguistics researcher and his two friends, Kalpana (Samvritha) and Anuradha (Mamta). Anuradha is the sensitive type who has gone through certain bitter experiences in love.

page115.title: Entry
page115.description: The plot revolves around two parallel stories in the film, of which the first involves ACP Shreya and ACP Rishikesh who are married for long, but at the moment are on the brink of a divorce and live separately.

page115.title: Da Thadiya
page115.description: The big, fat, cute Luke John falls in love with his childhood crush Ann. Realizing she is not so fond of his fatness, Luke embarks on a 'quest' to loose his weight.

page115.title: Annayum Rasoolum
page115.description: The story of how Rasool, a Muslim falls in love with a Christian girl, Anna and how her family's strong disapproval makes their relationship change for the worse.

page116.title: Yakshiyum Njanum
page116.description: Aathira is a ghost who wants to take her revenge from the home minister as he was responsible for her father's, her lover's and her death. Will the home minister pay for his actions?

page116.title: The Thriller
page116.description: Simon is the son of Joseph Palathinkal, a business multi-millionaire. One night during the night patrol, Niranjan finds Simon stabbed and murdered on a highway. Who killed him? and why?

page116.title: Swantham Bharya Zindabad
page116.description: This movie has drama comedy love and emotions. Vettoor Sivankutty gets married to a beautiful girl, who doesn't believe in communist ideals. She is also a huge fan of superstar Pavan Kumar.

page116.title: Pokkiri Raja
page116.description: Madhavan Nair unknowingly kills a teenager. Raja, his eldest son, takes the blame and is sentenced to jail for five years. After jail, Raja rescues the daughter of a village land lord in Madurai, becomes his right hand Pokkiri Raja.

page116.title: Malarvaadi Arts Club
page116.description: Five friends are disappointed about the way their favorite hangout Malarvaadi Arts Club is headed. They take the responsibility of reviving the club in their own hands.

page116.title: Kanyakumari Express
page116.description: Kanyakumari Express is about an Assistant police commissioner Mohan Sanker. He lost his wife and children in an accident and shifted his job to Crime Branch. He did this only to lead a calm life. Change in his duty was welcomed by some politicians.

page117.title: Kandahar
page117.description: Another mission with Mahadevan and crew, as they deal with international terrorism with a flight being hijacked by hardcore terrorists.

page117.title: Kadha Thudarunnu
page117.description: Vidyalakshmi decides to start a life with her love, Shanavas, by challenging the dictates of her family. Shanavas too faces severe opposition from his family members since he gets married to a girl from another caste.

page117.title: Four Friends
page117.description: Four people from different backgrounds become friends as they are brought together by one thing in common - cancer. In the group, there is a hooligan, a multimillionaire, a musician and a girl who is troubled by her stepmother.

page117.title: Elsamma Enna Aan
page117.description: Elasamma is the eldest daughter of KPAC Lalitha and after her father's death, she starts working as the newspaper agent.Elsamma is also an activist who wants to close the local toddy shop run by a strongman (Vijayaraghavan).

page117.title: Alexander The Great
page117.description: Alexander Varma (Mohanlal) is an intelligent man but fate sends him to prison. After the untimely death of a Dubai based businessman, Prathapa Varma, his kin start fighting over his property.

page117.title: Again Kasergod Khader Bai
page117.description: Kaladarshana troop, who were responsible for the arrest of Kasargod Kader Bhai's son Kasim Bhai, are invited to perform at the jail. When Kasim Bhai finds out, he attacks them during the program. But the series of events take a new turn the next day.

page118.title: Happy Husband
page118.description: A bar singer impacts the lives of three people, and through a series of mishaps, they all come together during a vacation in Malaysia. A comedy entertainer!!

page118.title: Paleri Manikam
page118.description: Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha tells the true story of the first recorded murder case in Kerala.A private detective gets an instinctive feeling to investigate a 52-year-old unsolved mystery.

page118.title: Mohabbath
page118.description: Anwar is a final year medical student in Bangalore and Sajna studies in a local professional college. They are cousins and their marriage had been fixed in childhood. Sajna's college-mate Ameer falls in love with her.

page118.title: Jagratha
page118.description: Jagratha is a 1989 Malayalam investigative thriller film directed by K. Madhu, starring Mammootty, Mukesh and Jagathy Sreekumar. This film is the second in the CBI investigative thrillers series featuring Mammootty as CBI officer Sethurama Iyer.

page118.title: Evidam Swargamanu
page118.description: A hard-working farmer takes the fight to an influential real estate dealer when the latter tries to take over his land to resell to a Mumbai-based businessman at a high profit.

page118.title: Duplicate
page118.description: An unemployed village lad who is down on his luck hits the jackpot when he is mistaken for a wealthy businessman who looks just like him.

page119.title: Drona 2010
page119.description: A realtor who specializes in ancient buildings is lured into buying a property that is believed to be haunted. The deal turns out to be fatal as he is killed, but his brother vows to avenge his death.

page119.title: Chattambinadu
page119.description: When planter Virendra Mallaya goes to Chembanadu, in Karnataka, to buy a coffee plantation, he finds it overrun with criminals, so he takes it upon himself to clean the place up.

page119.title: Anwar
page119.description: The revenge of Anwar against the terrorists who killed Anwar's family in a bomb blast. After the Blast, Anwar plans a secret mission to find the faces behind the Blast.

page119.title: Thampuraty
page119.description: A Malayalam Dubbed Version of Telugu movie starring Namitha.

page119.title: Ringtone
page119.description: Krishna is running from the police for attacking them in public in an attempt to save his mother who was lathi charged. He was travelling in a truck and he meets Meera. The truck meets with an accident.

page119.title: Parayan Marannathu
page119.description: Chandran lives with his wife and daughter.He has a neighbor Madhavi who washes clothes for a living. She was born in a rich family but her husband and his family rejected her. Her daughter Gauri falls in love with Chandran changing her life completely.

page120.title: Mummy and Me
page120.description: Clara has trouble giving in to the rebellious ways of her teenaged daughter Jewel and often it's her husband Jo who gets caught in between the two. Life isn't exactly heaven for the family of four.The film revolves around this family.

page120.title: Utharaswayamvaram
page120.description: The story is about Prakash (Jayasurya) whose father, Sreedhara Kurup, runs a supermarket. Prakashs father wants him to become an officer but Prakashs interests lie elsewhere. After graduation, he is more interested in the activities of the village arts club than in looking for a job.

page120.title: Thathwamasi
page120.description: Thathwamasi is a 2010 Malayalam film directed by Swami Viswa Chaithanya. Vineeth, Lakshmi Gopalaswamy Master Dhananjay and Manikkuttan plays the lead roles in this film.

page120.title: Sakudumbam Shyamala
page120.description: Shyamala was not very good at her studies and fails in her Pre-degree examination. Her family arranges her marriage with an American guy, but he wants Shyamala to pass her Pre-Degree for the marriage to happen.

page120.title: Scene Onnu Nammude Veedu
page120.description: Scene Onnu Nammude Veedu is a Malayalam film directed by Shyju Anthikkad.It is the final film Thilakan appeared in.

page120.title: Molly Aunty Rocks
page120.description: The film is about a middle aged, upright NRI woman who comes to a village and faces some unexpected hurdles.

page121.title: Parudeesa
