page121.description: Sarath interweaves a complex theme -that of conflict of belief, the perpetual disagreement between orthodox and unorthodox paths of religion.The film, set against the backdrop of a remote hillside hamlet, unravels the story of a priest and a verger.

page121.title: I Love Me
page121.description: Ram Mohan, a high profile businessman, brings two criminals - Xavi and Prem - from Kochi to Bangkok to kill a person, so that Ram can save his sinking business empire. The situation gets complicated when Samantha enters the equation.

page121.title: Face To Face
page121.description: Balachandran is a principled cop who always sticks to his ethics and aims to put a full stop to crimes wherever he is posted and he immediately springs to action. As a result most of the times he suspects something or the other.

page121.title: The Hit List
page121.description: Vikram is a cop and after the death of his wife, he leads a single solitary life with seriousness all along. He is assigned to investigate into serial killings of police officers.

page121.title: Paattinte Palazhy
page121.description: Veena aspires to become a world-renowned singer. When she realizes that the music within her has no ways of flowing out, she is driven almost to madness, but eventually finds a way to express it.

page121.title: Oru Naal Varum
page121.description: A corrupt town official (Sreenivasan) takes advantage of a man who needs his approval for a house.

page122.title: Kottaaramveettile Appoottan
page122.description: A local aristocrat takes a young girl under his wings and becomes her financial sponsor, and eventually falls in love with her.

page122.title: Body Guard
page122.description: Ammu,the daughter of a wealthy man fall in love with her bodyguard anonymously. A romantic action comedy film written and directed by Siddique. It stars Dileep and Nayantara in the lead roles.

page122.title: Apoorvaragam
page122.description: Apoorvaragam is the story of three youngsters Roopesh (Nishan), Nancy (Nithya Menen) and Tommy (Asif Ali). Roopesh has always been in love with Nancy but has never had the nerve to express it. For Nancy, love is something that is beyond word.

page122.title: Yugapurushan
page122.description: An account of the life and teachings of Sree Narayana Guru, a renowned social reformer and philiosopher.

page122.title: Aagathan
page122.description: En route to Bangalore, a man falls in love with a beautiful girl. But he soon realizes that her father was responsible for the death of his sister during a terrorist attack a long time ago.

page122.title: Thanthonni
page122.description: The film is about Kochukunju (Prithviraj) who is the youngest member of the wealthy Vadakkan Veettil family. He happens to be a brat who is living life on his own terms.

page123.title: T. D. Dasan Std. VI B
page123.description: The film deals with a child's desire to see his father, and the beginning is made when he gets a clue from a piece of paper he finds in his mother's trunk.It was screened at various international film festivals and has garnered several awards.

page123.title: Shudharil Shudhan
page123.description: Raman is a tea estate employee who dearly holds the red flag close to his chest. As the employees' union goes on an indefinite strike, the comrade stays put despite hunger gnawing away at his family.

page123.title: Punyam Aham
page123.description: A Brahmin falls in love with a woman of a lower caste during India's freedom struggle. They marry and have a son, but soon the man abandons his family. When the son grows up, he sets out to find his father.

page123.title: Pramani
page123.description: Story about Panicker, a corrupted Panchayat president. He earns a lot of wealth through his corruption and by cornering his village people to hand over their lands to him. Panicker's dealings are done through his cousin, brother and confidant, Somasekhara.

page123.title: Pennpattanam
page123.description: This films takes a look at the struggle for survival of four women who are Kudumbasree workers portrayed by Revathi, KPAC Lalitha, Shwetha Menon and Vishnupriya.

page123.title: Kutty Srank
page123.description: Conflicting accounts emerge when three women claim to be the widow of a dead sailor.

page124.title: Janakan
page124.description: Suresh Gopi plays the role of Vishwam, a man who has been convicted of the murder of those who raped his only daughter. Seetha, aka Anu (Priya Lal), is the heroine. Mohanlal plays Soorya Narayanan, an advocate who comes to the innocent mans rescue.

page124.title: In Ghost House Inn
page124.description: Thomaskutty invites his friends to his newly bought Bungalow to stay there for a while and change the native people's concept of being thought as a Haunted mansion.

page124.title: April Fool
page124.description: April Fool is a 2010 Malayalam comedy film directed by Viji Thampi, scripted by Jagadish, and produced by Santosh Damodar. It stars Siddique, Jagadish and Navya Natarajan in lead roles.

page124.title: Black Stallion
page124.description: Black is a goon who falls in love with Laura Singh, a bar dancer. He tries to force her into marriage, but she stabs him and runs away to Kochi with her physically challenged sister.

page124.title: Mallu Singh
page124.description: Ani, searching for his cousin Hari who disappeared seven years ago, ends up in Punjab where he confronts with Hareendar Singh, a.k.a Mallu Singh. Amidst comical situations, Ani tries to prove Mallu Singh is Hari himself.

page124.title: Hero
page124.description: A stuntman who falls in love with an actress gains the hatred and jealousy of a superstar.Prithviraj plays the role of a stuntman. Popular model and actress Yami Gautam from the Hindi film ``Vicky Donor`` makes her Malayalam debut.

page125.title: Bachelor Party
page125.description: A group of gangsters, get together to protect of them from a killer; they approach another gangster for advice, but they get double crossed and also lose their friend in a shootout firing. The remaining gang decides to avenge their friend's death.

page125.title: Sandwich
page125.description: After an accident a software engineer (Kunchacko Boban) gets Sandwiched between two goons.

page125.title: Raama Raavanan
page125.description: A man displaced by political violence falls for a woman from the opposing faction.

page125.title: Naayika
page125.description: Gracy is a leading star until she suddenly disappears from the silver screen. Now, Aleena has come to do a documentary and unravels her sudden disappearance from the silver screen

page125.title: Pathinonnil Vyazham
page125.description: Appu (Mukesh) works as a bearer in a five star hotel at Palakkad. He happens to meet Chandran Pillai once, who is a millionaire based in Ooty. Appu rescues Chandran Pillai from an accident.

page125.title: Nallavan
page125.description: Kocherukkan is a carefree youth who is in love with cheery Malli and make their living at the house of two landowners of the village as their servants. Soon a series of ups and downs occur after their marriage.

page126.title: Kausthubham
page126.description: The film is the story of Yamuna whose life is filled with worries and sorrows. Her husband is sent to jail on a false count of murder. Her three-year-old son gets lost during a temple festival and that increases her problems.

page126.title: Kaaryasthan
page126.description: Dileep and Salim play the overseers of rich families that have been rivals with each other for a long time which makes these overseers also to turn into the foe with each other.

page126.title: Best Of Luck
page126.description: Four youngsters, Surya, Manu, Neethu and Dia, who have no-one but each other in life. As luck would have it, some rich Nayikar in some distant village reveals a secret on his death bed that Surya is his son.

page126.title: Thappana
page126.description: A local petty thief is out from jail. On his journey back, he meets a girl who is also a convict coming out of jail. He decides to help her on his way back.

page126.title: Smart City
page126.description: A 10-year-old orphan raises his hand against a police officer who commits an act of injustice. Impressed, Sekharan (Murali), the godfather-like gang leader who cares for the poor, gives him shelter.

page126.title: Ee Adutha Kaalathu
page126.description: The movie features the lives of six different persons from different strata of the social life of the city, interconnected due to unexpected events beyond their control.

page127.title: Cobra
page127.description: Even though twins, Raja and Kari wouldn't pass for twins in anyone's eyes.Their quest for suitable brides lands them in the house of a single father with two daughters.

page127.title: Bhoopadathil Illatha Oridam
page127.description: Madhavankutty is a schoolmaster in a remote village. He is famous among students and his friends but his wife keeps complaining about not helping her in the house. But after a certain incident, people started moving away from him.

page127.title: Simhasanam
page127.description: The film depicts an emotional bonding between a father (Sai Kumar) and son (Prithviraj).

page127.title: Silent Valley
page127.description: A group of youth plans to go for a picnic to a jungle after seeing a link in the internet. There they have to face some unexpected problems and the rest of the film unfolds the truth.

page127.title: Shikkari
page127.description: The film was the Kannada debut of Mammootty and Malayalam debut of director Abhay Simha and music director V. Harikrishna. Both Mammootty and Poonam Bajwa play double roles, set in two different timelines.

page127.title: Puthiya Theerangal
page127.description: Thamara, an orphan lives near the sea side. Sometime later she meets an old man who reminds her of her father. The film depicts their bond and how it changes when other people move to the sea side.

page128.title: Ozhimuri
page128.description: A 55-year old woman files a divorce petition against her 71-year old husband, after over 30 years of married life. Their son, and a female advocate searches for the reason and circumstances, changing their perception about some people.

page128.title: Namukku Parkkan
page128.description: Namukku Parkkan reflects the realities of a middle-class Malayali family. Rajeev, a veterinary surgeon, and Renuka, a primary school teacher, are happily married couple with two daughters. They have a dream to own a house amidst nature.

page128.title: Mullamottum Munthiricharum
page128.description: Churatta Jose, a local goon and an expert snake catcher is stabbed on his stomach by someone at night. A flash back reveals his early life.

page128.title: Manthrikan
page128.description: Manthrikan depicts an unemployed man who`s trying to get rid of an evil spirit. This comic thriller stars Jayaram as the leading actor with actress Poonam Bajwa opposite him.

page128.title: No. 66 Madhura Bus
page128.description: A journey of love and revenge, the film's story unfolds amidst the travel of an interstate bus

page128.title: Lakshmi Vilasam Renuka Makan
page128.description: Urvashi plays the title role as Lakshmi Vilasam Renuka, a dominating yet non-corrupt PWD officer. She stands by her principles, which eventually earns her a lot of enemies. The movie is about the hardships that Renuka has to endure.
